name: Ryan Robinson
text:
Best Experience Possible!
I used to think that chiropractic work was some sort of medieval practice but Eastern Shore Chiropractic has shown me that it really is advanced comprehensive medicine.

The knowledgeable and friendly staff take a comprehensive approach to treat the issue. They start with a thorough evaluation of the issue and all necessary x-rays, they then create a treatment plan that includes addressing all components of the issue at hand: treating muscles, fascia, and of course the skeletal structure.

Before being treated for my chronic and debilitating neck/spine pain I didn't think I would ever recover. Now, I have hope that I won't have to deal with this the rest of my life! They don't only treat the issue, they also really focus on creating a at-home physical therapy plan to also address what is creating the issue.

Do not consider anywhere else, Eastern Shore Chiropractic is by far the best option, no matter the issue.

resp.text: Ryan, we really appreciate your review! Thank you!

He used ART on my hip, glutes and legs. It took about 4 weeks of visits, but he finally got me back to running. I learned a lot of useful stretches and ways to take care of myself when running.

I have recommended their office to many people and will continue to do so. They're professional, friendly and caring!

name: Jonathan Hoffmann
text:
I have seen Dr. Justin for a few different issues over the past year.  After finding his contact information on the A.R.T. providers page, I decided to schedule an appointment.  I was initially hesitant, as I live in Pensacola and would need to drive almost an hour to get to Fairhope.  I can say that each and every trip I make down for an appointment is absolutely worth it.  Unlike other practitioners that I've seen, Dr. Justin took the time to listen to my concerns and give me feedback.  I didn't feel like another patient on the assembly line.

I was also impressed with his ability to provide me with some immediate relief.  Using A.R.T., Dr. Justin was able to help me alleviate some nagging hip flexor pain, and also give me more range of motion in my knee, in one visit.  While some follow-up visits are required to completely alleviate certain issues, I was impressed with how quickly I felt relief.  It was also helpful to know that Dr. Justin was involved in the same workout program as me, so he really understood the nature of my pain.  It's nice to be treated someone who appears to "practice what they preach" in terms of living a healthful life.

And lastly, the staff at Eastern Shore Chiropractic & Sports Clinic is outstanding.  I'm always greeted by friendly faces when I walk in the door and have never had an issue getting an appointment at a time that is convenient for me.  They are honest, and even notified me of a credit that I had on my account that I was unaware of.  I would whole-heartedly recommend Dr. Justin to my family and friends for any sort of sports-related pain issues.

resp.text: ThanksJonathan, we really appreciate this wonderful review. We pride ourselves on helping all our patients not only obtain pain relief but also helping them understand what is causing the pain. We feel that all of our patients are family and as family we want them to feel at home whenever they visit us. Thanks again and please stay in touch.

text: I started with Vital Force in January 2021.  As a Registered Nurse, you better believe I did some research and asked questions prior to starting. I felt horrible. A full 2 years of my body aching bone deep, I didn't have the energy to get beyond half a day. I knew my hormones were way out of balance.  I also knew something was more wrong than being a 50yr old menopausal woman who had to live with it.  The program was explained in detail.  Once my lab work came back.  I mean an extensive panel of labs!  The proof was right there in front of me.  The Team at Vital Force tailored a program to fit my needs.  It took about 3 weeks of taking supplements and IV infusion therapy then I noticed a huge change in my self. Each week, I was better than the last.  I HAVE MY LIFE BACK !!  I feel better than I have in years.  If you don't take time to take care of yourself, you body will make you do it !  If you are in doubt about whether Vital Force is right for you , GO, meet with the team and let them help you be the best version of yourself.

As soon as results came in I got a call from Ryan to discuss my parameters and what all we could do to get everything back in check. Between vitamins, supplements, and prescriptions he has taken the BEST care of me and has been there for me to make sure we get me at my best self!!

I have "Optimal" levels for my body to feel and perform better in my daily life...

In response to the guys review giving horrible results from Complete Hormone Solutions and his alleged treatment... I choose to ask this of Google.
Cause you know, "Do your research!"... below is what I found.

Google results:
What does a high hematocrit mean?
Higher than normal hematocrit levels represent abnormally elevated red blood cell counts. High hematocrits can be seen in people living at high altitudes and in chronic smokers. Dehydration produces a falsely high hematocrit that disappears when proper fluid balance is restored. Some other infrequent causes of an elevated hematocrit are lung disease, certain tumors, a disorder of the bone marrow known as polycythemia rubra Vera, and abuse of the drug erythropoietin (Epogen) by athletes for "blood doping" purposes.
Sir, I hope you're doing well, but I must say it doesnt look like your issues are from any hormone treatment recieved from anywhere at all! ~Sincerely, Wanda... a satisfied client.

text:
They get one star for the staff beong courteous at previous appointments.  I have been an established general practice patient for more then 4 years.  When I had an urgent need to reschedule an appointment they would not return my calls and then said the next appointment was 2-3 months out and they would not refill my blood pressure and blood sugar medicine in the interim.  Since my health is dependent on those medications I was forced to seek out a new doctor's office.
They may treat weight loss patients better but I would not recommend for general practice needs.

resp.text: As a medical office we have policies and procedures in place to promote safety. Medications must be monitored which is why visits are required- we do bridge medications when possible because we understand "life happens". However, please keep in mind when posting a poor review you should be truthful of your actions surrounding the event also.  We wish you all the best life has to offer. Thank you.

resp.text:
Good afternoon,
You will find that we are not like most clinics. We are actually very thorough. Whether you're getting the injection for weight loss or other needs we like to assess that so that we ensure you get the full benefit. You would not spend just 5 minutes in and out the first time you come to get an injection, that is why there is a fee. text: Don't know where to start. Most people like this place, but don't go if you don't know what you want. I told them my symptoms (and meds) and was pushed to buy 2 products. Got home to research and both items interfered with my medications. Taking items back is like you broke some major rule. It is frowned upon. Not that they care, but I won't be back.

resp.text:
Jeanna, I am so sorry about your experience, and I hope that you will change your mind and give us another chance. Our employees are not allowed to give medical advice. Our policy is to tell you to talk to your pharmacist about possible interactions. That being said, the internet is NOT a good place to research that information. I implore you to ask your pharmacist.

As for feeling frowned upon for a return, please understand that we are human and are capable of allowing our emotions to show on our sleeve as much as anyone, but I will talk to the employee that assisted you and let her know that she made you feel badly.

Again, I apologize for your experience and hope that you will give us a chance to make it right.

I would highly recommend anyone to become a member at southern muscle under the NEW owner beau. I had a situation where I had canceled my membership and charges continued to come out of my account after I talked to the previous owner about my no longer attending.

Although Beau took over the gym back in July, he was fully understanding of the situation and although he did not HAVE to, he refunded me back a significant portion of the money I had lost with the previous owner due to there lack of communication with the vendor who withdrawals money from the accounts.

This owner genuinely cares about the members, it goes beyond a simple membership and a hello here and there! Charter and professionalism speaks volumes. THANK YOU AGAIN! ❤️

name: Ryan Wade
text:
I was told that I was not locked into a contract when I originally joined. I filled out automatic draft information with no problems. I was told the set-up fees were to be waived and monthly charges were $29.95. The auto draft amounts are different most months ($29.95- $59.95) with absolutely no explanation for the difference. I figured because I cut the owners sons hair I would have been told the truth-Guess not.
So if you are into a gym with dated equipment, management that takes hours (or days to return a call), and inconsistent billing this is the gym for you!!
As for me-I can't wait to transfer my drivers license to PROVE to "Paramount Acceptance" billing company that I no longer live in Montgomery so they will stop drafting my account.

name: Caitlin Leonard
text:
This is my second time at Dr. Willis' office and it will definitely be my last. The first  time I went to her office  I didn't have any problems besides having to call to get my results and the office not answering their phones. This year her office emailed me about making my yearly appointment which I did. I called the office and was sent to voicemail which they ask you to leave information. After three days of not getting a response I called the office and the receptionist was nice and scheduled me for the only available appointment until August. The next day I received a call from another receptionist responding to my voicemail that I sent earlier that week..... The day of the appointment I called Dr. Willis office EIGHT times trying to get someone to help me locate the office (I hadn't been there in two years because of school). After the first three calls not being answered (15 minutes late to the appointment at this point) I was transferred to the emergency line (was on hold for 5 mins). Without even asking my needs I was transferred to another hotline which transferred me to another hotline that transferred me back to the original person I was trying to speak with! After being on hold multiple times for almost 15 minutes I hung up, called back and the exact same thing happened again. After 30 minutes of trying to find the office I finally was able to talk to someone and ended up canceling the appointment.

This was the most frustrating and difficult doctor's experience I've ever had. I do no recommend!

I would not trade her for anything in the world and I would recommend that if you want a  professional, spiritual and genuine person seek her services. text:
I have been seeing Dr. Willis for the past six years. She has been a wonderful doctor over the years and her staff is equally as amazing.

In June 2015 I suffered a serious complication while pregnant, and my child had to be delivered seven weeks before her due date. Because of Dr. Willis's extensive knowledge, she was able to stabilize my vitals to allow additional time for my child's lungs to develop more. It was then I knew for sure that I would be a patient as long as I live in the Birmingham area.

Another thing I love about her is that she honest; even when I don't want to hear the truth. Lol! But she will lays everything out and answers all questions; thus giving you the ability to make an informed decision regarding your healthcare.

name: K Sharpe
text: I have used several different chiropractors over the past 25 years and I will say that hands down Dr. Marino is the best! He actually cares about the well being of his patients and really listens to you when you have a specific problem. He doesn’t just do an adjustment and hope for the best. He actually fixes the problem! I highly recommend him if you are needing to visit a chiropractor!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words. We try daily to achieve the best results in the shortest amount of time! Dr. Marino.

name: Daniel Michael
text: Mike listens. Then he makes an informed decision about your health needs. I can’t give 10 stars because I’m limited to only 5.

name: Ashley Carpenter
text: Hands down the very best Chiropractor in the World!!!No joke! Amazing results after 1 time

name: Lisa Wilder Brown
text:
Dr. Marino is very knowledgeable, great experience, never disappointed.
Over 18 years ago, I suffered from plantar fasciitis. So painful in the mornings it took me a while to get out of bed. He used the Graston technique for 4-5 visits. Never had another episode - EVER! - still to this day!
Highly recommend him for any ailment!

name: Christian Oliveros
text: Definitely a life changer. Didn't know what to do or where to even begin. Between partial paralysis, insomnia, and irregular breathing, many things ailed me. I paid a visit to Dr. Marino and learned a lot about how something so simple could vastly affect the way my body works. A "neural reset" as he describes it. Felt much better after my first visit. Make bi-weekly visits to keep my body in better condition. I really appreciate what he's done for me.

name: Keri S
text: Dr. Marino is the most knowledgeable chiropractor I've ever met! He is caring and informative. He is typically able to diagnose without the use of X-rays or diagnostic imaging and uses a range of diverse techniques to ensure the right kind of adjustment. After the adjustment he even gives advice on stretches and exercises to do to relieve pain when it starts as well as to prevent it in the future if done as recommended. He also suggested supplements to take and specific foods to either avoid or eat more of to achieve a completely healthy and balanced body. It's amazing the things that chiropractic care can help with that don't even appear to be related until you remember that your nerves control everything and all your nerves are connected to the spine. He is also the one that does the acupuncture, which I might just have to try now. I highly recommend this chiropractor no matter what the pain or problem he CAN help either himself or at least point you in the right direction.

name: Angela Smith
text: Wonderful Doctors! Everyone is so friendly, and they really do all they can for their patients. Absolutely my first pick!

name: Debbie Ball
text: I have Not seen this doctor in long time ...but when I did they were always good to me All of them

name: Paige Collins
text: I have seen Dr. Dozier about 6 times since early 2019. His nurse, Lauren has taken over 7 days to return my phone calls. She never returned my last one regarding a lab bill that she told me would be over $200 less than what it was. I pay out of pocket and require pricing up front so that I can prepare financially for procedures. I ask the front desk, the nurse and the Dr. what the cost out of pocket for my procedure is going to be. After my procedure I pay in full before I leave. But it NEVER fails.... a few days go by and I receive a bill for hundreds of dollars I wasn't prepared for. I pay these expenses by using pay my provider on the care credit website and 3 weeks later I get another bill with end of month type charges on it. I then have to call and tell them all my payment information and confirmation number etc. All while receiving attitude. I've dealt with the bs long enough. I will not be returning for follow up care.

resp.text: Hi Ms. Collins, please call our office and ask for our administrator. We would love the opportunity to discuss your experience with you. Women's Healthcare strives to provide the best level of service in the Wiregrass.

name: Taisheria Bradham
text:
I’m 23 weeks pregnant with my second child. My first child was delivered early via c section because of preeclampsia. My doctor with my first pregnancy retired so I decided to try women’s healthcare. I originally was seeing one doctor who told me my baby had a 50% chance of having spinia bifida or some other defect I was also mailed the wrong lab results. Not only that she called and corrected herself and said she was looking at someone else’s results and my baby was fine. I switched over to another doctor at women’s healthcare and today I was made to feel super uncomfortable. They sat outside the room and questioned my motherhood and why I came in/ called so much with blood pressure concerns. I also was told to get undressed because I explained I was having pressure but upon hearing someone say I don’t want to go In there I put my clothes back on a refused. I’ve been having pressure and light bleeding since Sunday and it’s sad I don’t feel comfortable enough to call my doctor or see my doctor. I really hope people learn to show compassion because there is already so many mean people in the world. You never know how much acts of kindness can go a long way especially for someone like me who just buried a relative this past Friday. I will
Continue to put my faith in god and hope for the best during this pregnancy.

name: Crystle Williams
text: Everyone at the center is very nice and helpful. I've never had to wait for more than 5 minutes before being called back and Dr. Dozier is amazing. His bedside manner and tendency to talk about normal things during the exam  makes one comfortable despite the general awkwardness of the procedure.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Crystle! Dr. Dozier is a great doctor and we are so glad to have him as part of our team.

name: R Golden
text: Had my yearly mammogram which is paid for by my insurance company. Because they had someone out-of-network read the results I now owe money. They said I needed to dispute it with my insurance company and my insurance company said they've paid their share and that Women's Healthcare is at fault. So, I will now have to pay the money owed and I WILL NEVER USE THEM AGAIN! It's pretty bad when you charge your patient for your mistake! I would give them no stars if I could!

name: Audra Weaver
text: The doctors are mindful and caring, but the staff are rude and argumentative, not friendly, and slow. Wait time is always a minimum of 2 hours, even when you're the only person in the lobby. The staff also do not read notes left in accounts and do not always schedule (or somehow/mysteriously delete) every appointment/test you are explicity told by your doctor to have done.

I have not been to my first appointment yet, but have already received excellent client care!
>Website is helpful, easy to navigate and the PDF forms are great.

Thank you, Women's Healthcare of Dothan staff and website / software architects.

text: Dr Nichols is very kind. wait time could be better, but overall it was a great experience.

name: Arial Roberts
text: DO NOT GO TO WOMENS HEALTHCARE OF DOTHAN. I have never been to a more unprofessional establishment such as womens healthcare of dothan. NO ONE EVER answers the phone. Everytime i recieved a call back it always is 2 minutes before they close so i cant call back. 2nd I was lied to and told my insurance would cover the visit and it did not.

name: S M
text:
Women's Healthcare of Dothan was highly recommended by a friend as the best OBGYN practice in town.o
Upon exiting the elevators, you'll be at the front desk area. There are 3 waiting rooms each almost completely out of sight of the reception desk area.
I arrived with my older children for my appt to take a pregnancy test. I had been informed over the phone that this was required before I could make my first prenatal appt. I hadn't experienced this with my previous pregnancies but everywhere is different.
The reason I was given for this requirement as a lot of women in the past have either lied about/ misread at-home pregnancy test results.
I arrived before my scheduled appt time, checked in, paid the $11 fee to take required lab test, informed that the practice was completely paperless so I wouldn't be given a checkout slip, asked to come back to the reception area to check out, and told to wait in waiting room 3 until the lab called me to take the pregnancy test.
I was seated in the waiting room 10 minutes before my appt time. I had one of the first lab appt times available so there were only a couple people in the waiting room. The waiting room is almost directly across to the open ares of the lab. The lab had several nurses/techs waiting around for more patients to arrive. I noticed that everyone who had arrived after me were being called immediately back to the lab. I waited 35 minutes after my scheduled appt time before I went to the front desk to figure out what was happening. When I asked one of the front desk if it was normal for new patients to wait this long just to take a pregnancy test. She was surprised and said the lab must have forgotten I was there. She called back to the lab and told me to go back to the waiting room. I could hear the lab nurse/tech say "Oh, oops. Yeah, we'll get her in."
I waited another 10 minutes before I was called to back. The nurse/tech asked how my day was going. I told her I was a bit frustrated with waiting so long. She told me that it wasn't the lab's fault as the front desk didn't actually check me in for my appt. The lab had no idea I was even waiting. She said it was also really my fault for not trying to figure out the problem sooner. After using the cup I had been handed, I returned to the lab area to find the nurse/tech. I waited in the lab area for 5 minutes before she returned. 60 mins after my appt time, I was informed that I was pregnant and the at-home test was correct. Everywhere is different and the practice had never seen me before so I kind of understand(given their past history) that I had to prove to them I wasn't lying. She wrote on a piece of paper my last cycle date and calculated due date. She told me to give the test results aka the paper she had just written on to the front desk to check out. So clearly, they aren't completely paperless. When I asked her where the test results actually were on this piece of paper she was confused and said "that the actual lab results didn't matter as I would be using their prenatal care anyway."
I went to the reception area to check out  and asked if I could get a copy of the paper aka the "test results" for myself. I was informed that would be against Federal Law for them to give me any of my test results. Then was told I would need to pay them upfront over double the amount of money I had been told over the phone. When I explained what I had been told by their insurance lady, I was told I was wrong. I asked them to call her which they did after complaining. Long story short, I had the correct info.
When I told them I would be going to another doctor practice. They were confused why I didn't want to continue to use them. They called records so I could get a copy of my test results. I was then informed I couldn't get a copy until it was put in the computer system and signed a general released(I did) and there wasn't a timeframe when they would mail me a copy.
This practice was the most unprofessional, rude, disorganized, misinformed practice I have ever gone too. Never again.

text: I had my first experience with CrossFit here. Andrew, one of the trainers really took the time to show me the correct mechanics for every workout! text: It is dope, if you’re thinking about joining you’re already doing to much, just join bruh.

name: Staci Walden
text: Andrew and the MoreFire team are outstanding!  As a newcomer to the area (and to CrossFit) I quickly found a home and expert guidance to navigate a new path to fitness.  As a health related professional it was very important to me that the approach used was scientific and evidence based, and that appropriate supervision was available to prevent injury and maximize benefit. All of my expectations were met. I truly couldn't recommend them any higher, stop thinking about it and do it!

resp.text: Thanks Staci, I'm glad you allowed us the opportunity to be the first to introduce you to CrossFit.  It makes us really happy that you have an additional shared passion (in CrossFit), that you can now mutually enjoy with your son.  It is always great to have other health & fitness professionals around to bounce ideas off of as well. As a Registered Dietitian you give great food for thought :-). https://foodsforthoughtllc.com/

name: Justin Brewer
text: Great group of people and the most detailed and personalized instruction I have ever received, highly recommend.

resp.text: Thanks Justin

name: Patrick Harbin
text: I had absolutely no experience with crossfit prior to joining Morefire, and now looking back, I  wish I would have started a lot sooner with Andrew and his gym. Even in my limited crossfit experience, l feel I can confidently say that most gyms in the Birmingham area will have the same equipment. However, what really sets this place apart from the others, is the head trainers knowledge, experience, and coaching style. I've learned more in the past 3 months than I have in the last 22 years of traditional weightlifting/exercising, and it has been a humbling experience to say the least. Andrew promotes community and self improvement, and since day 1 of the on-ramp course he's done nothing but motivate me and taken a genuine interest in helping me reach my goals. Great dude and good gym all around.

resp.text: Thanks Patrick.

name: Carlton Adderley
text: Feel the burn!! This is a gym where you can definitely be pushed to the next level. The trainers pay careful attention to your goals, they are also great at scaling up or down work outs to maximize safety and ensure you get the most out of your time and effort. This is the gym for people who want results and are ready to work for it, and have fun at the same time.  10/10 would recommend!

resp.text: Thank you! A safe CrossFit workout to help you meet your lifestyle goals and maximize results is our passion!

text: The best to ever do it! I really need to get back soon!

text: I dropped in for open gym. Andrew basically gave me a private coaching session. He went way above and beyond to work through some muscle up drills and cleaned up my power clean technique. He knows how to break down a movement and then demonstrate how to do it. He adapts his teaching to how you learn. If I lived in the area I would call this place home.

resp.text: Thanks for stopping by, it was a pleasure helping you out.  Hopefully we'll see you on future visits.

name: J. Blitz
text: Such a great gym, a close-knit bunch that really felt like family.  Andrew and Jason are great coaches, really knowledgeable and great with people. I started going after a running injury, and I was leery of CrossFit going in. I thought it was crazy and dangerous.  Some CrossFit gyms have a reputation of throwing their clients into the fire with little or no training, leading to injury or just being discouraged. This turned out to be just the opposite. Not only did they help rehab the injury, but I got into the best shape I'd been in since college.  If I hadn't moved out of state,  I'd still be a member. (I still stop in when I can)

resp.text: Thanks J, I hope you are able to find a good box in your new home.

text: Classic Crossfit. Caring coaches. The effort made to ensure your movements are correct and Drew’s keen eye will keep you safe and get you on you way to bionic in no time at all. Great people and a welcoming community.

name: Barbiewants 2beme
text: TERRIBLY RUDE STAFF! I have to say this is the most unprofessional staff i have ever met. I live over 2.5 hours away and made appointments for procedures on a wed and thurs which me and my husband both had to take off work for because it was the only day that dr. doucett did the procedure and i would need a driver. I paid for a hotel (200) for wed night so we could stay in huntsville for the procedure the next day. I was called by the center that i was suppose to have my procedure done ( 2pm on wed ) at 6am on wed wanting to know where i was. Well i had not been informed that my time had changed. I spoke with the office twice on friday and once on monday before the procedure and was never informed. I called the office at 845 and was spoken to so rudely by christina (christin something like that) . that i have canceled all my future appointments. I am out 1200$( days missed working , hotel fees, and the cost of the labs and everything i had done before this, for this procedure..and that is just this trip) for this office mistakes but was talked to so rudely and disrespectful. I have been in the medical field 25 years and would never speak to a patient like that especially when it was this offices error. I highly recommend looking elsewhere for a surgeon if the staff is this rude to dr foreman patients.  I will be filing a complaint with the state board and following up with a lawyer also.I wish i had of read the reviews before making appointments with this office this seems to be an ongoing problem for this practice

text: Great gym small town health club feel in the bustling suburbs. Great escape after the workday.

text: Great gym. Good selection of classes, machines are well maintained and plentiful, it is clean and the staff is Ah-may-zing. Everyone of them has answered questions or made suggestions to help me. Great atmosphere, staff and gym members are extremely supportive

name: Terri Nicole VO
text: I love this gym! The people are terrific, the workouts are killer, the equipment and free weights and ample and well taken care of! Love spin, the boot camp style synergy and trx, Zumba, power pump, kick boxing. I've got to try the yoga class that everyone raves about next.  The owner and staff and sweet and responsive too any need you have. The trainers are wonderful - shout out to Cedric and Amanda who are truly experts in their field. It won't take you long to feel like one of the family!!

name: Nicole Collier
text:
I highly suggest @helenahealthclub They have $5 enrollments this month. They are 24/7 365 days, have childcare, personal trainers, nutrition consultations, the equipment is always well kept and clean, PLUS amazing classes like HIIT, power pump, spin, zumba and cardio kick.

The biggest thing for us though is how incredibly friendly everyone is. There is zero pretentiousness.

name: Wes Christie
text: Good atmosphere, all the equipment you need. Members and staff are always friendly.

name: Clifton J McMillan Sr

(Original)
Bueno

name: Gd Ford
text: I had been a smoker for 40 plus years. I smoked a pack a day and tried to quit numerous times. The hazzle of not being able to walk to my mailbox without getting out of breath is now a thing in my past. I am now able to walk to my mailbox without loosing my breath. Not only am I now a non smoker but I have even been sleeping better. Thanks to Robertsdale Hypnosis for making me a nonsmoker!

name: Reunion Pointe
text: Diets? I have been on all of them.   Even though I never gave up hope of better health and more beautiful shape, I was totally blown away by how hypnosis helped me achieve results with absolutely no diet at all.   I thought I was happy this morning when I put on jeans I hadn’t been able to wear for years but happier when the shorts I wore yesterday came off without unbuttoning or unzipping them.   My husband commented the shorts need to hit the donation bag! This is a journey and I still have a ways to go.   I see the road ahead as an easy one to navigate.

name: Annette Nolan
text:
When I started this weight loss program I was 156 pounds and a size 12.  8 sessions later, I am 146 pounds and a very comfortable size 10!  With 13 inches GONE!

And the best part is I’ve been able to maintain that loss (and add to it) over time... even over Thanksgiving. No more YO-YO dieting for me! Hypnosis works so much better than any diet.

It isn’t magic but the audio tapes I use in my program make me feel more alive... more confident. Even 2 weeks after listening to them I felt like I came out from under a rock - I was more aware and hopeful for my ultimate success - which is a size 8. I have only 15 more pounds to go and I’m very sure I’ll reach that goal in the next 3 months, then I’m set!!! I can’t wait.

I’m surprised at how much more energy I have, I’m sleeping better and my stress level is much better.

In truth, Not all hypnotists are created equally. I did see a hypnotist a few times 25 years ago... but he was not nearly as professional and didn’t give me anywhere near the support, information or products that I have here. Robertsdale Hypnosis even has a service guarantee. As long as I was accepted into a program, they will stick with me until I get my goal weight as long as I follow instructions! Can’t beat that.

I’ve decided to be on one of their ads as soon as I lose the rest of the weight! Look for me there!!

name: minoley1
text:
I just finished my first hypnosis session to stop smoking and WOW!!!!  My stress level was about a 10 before I came to Robertsdale Hipnosis. After just one session it is truly zero. My mind is so relaxed, it almost seems like my problems are only half as bad, and I truly do not want a cigarette. I'M DONE!

I admit Iwas a little doubtful if this would work at first.  More than anything I just wanted to feel like I didn't want a cigarette anymore. And it's weird! I really feel that way now! I am so glad I made myself call for my free screening. This is so worth it. Try it! it might change your life. It did for mine.

name: Tasha Johnson
text: I had never done anything like this before but after one session I actually quit smoking! I smoked a pack, sometimes more a day for 11 years! I have tried everything to quit, patches, lozenges, all of it!  Absolutely the best experience and best decision I ever made. I feel 10x better and healthier. The hypnosis has helped me with my confidence and anxiety also. If your on the fence and not sure if it something you want to do, do it! Julie is wonderful!

name: Crystal Moye
text:
The thing I wanted to know the most when I came here was how it worked for people. I was done with diets that don't work and I really wanted to learn to eat like a thin person.

Besides learning that, I also found out how to get rid of stress and calm down in my head.
I was surprised how much my sleep improved from the first day which makes my life a whole lot calmer.  My husband has noticed I'm more relaxed and active and he's happy with the results so far.

What's really cool is already I'm only eating HALF of what I used to, and it's not because
I "have to" it's because I WANT to and that is a huge change.

My advice to someone looking at coming here is there are so many benefits and things you learn about yourself when you come here, you shouldn't miss it!

name: Chris Roberson
text: I gotta tell the truth..  I am the most skeptical  person you will ever meet.  I was really doubtful  about hypnosis  and whether or not it really worked  It kinda seemed  like it was just gimmicky.  However I smoked all the way up until my appointment  time at 3PM.  When my first session  was complete I walked out and had zero, I mean zero desire for a cigarette!  I haven't smoked in 3 weeks now and have no desire to.  I am a believer!  I was a smoker for 35 years! I am  a non smoker  now, for the rest of my life! Julie is awesome! I will save in 3 months of not smoking what I paid for the sessions! It is totally worth it!

name: Mrs. Araza
text:
yesterday I went out and bought a size 9 because I can no longer fit in my size 15s any more! This is only my 5 session in my weight lost program... its helped me start exercising more eating right and finding foods I like to eat healthy more... its helped me become healthier on the inside with my heart and soul to get me to where I've lost two pant sizes....

I came in to this with an open mind because I new a few other people that have done hypnosis on to quit smoking and it work same a losing weight... to this day for 10 years they haven't touched a cigarette... as well as the people I know that have done weight lose has stayed small with out gaining any weight back....

I'm sooo excited to get back to where i was before my stroke it has been a big challenge for over a year and a half to lose my weight that I gained because of it... im very happy that I've done the hypnosis if it was it for them i would still be lost...

I'm very thankful ive met her and came to this location. I live in CA/AZ and decided to come here in Alabama. I'm sooo thankful i met her and worked with her!

Thank you sooooo very much for all this work...

name: Ginger Placente
text: Last Sunday I went to church in a smaller size pair of pants and I was very happy. That was only after four sessions of hypnosis to lose weight. I am surprised at the amount of progress this early in the program because I am not on a diet, or restricting what I eat. It just seems to be happening very easy. Next I am going to get a cute little summer dress. It's been years since I have done that. I'm excited.

resp.text: That's awesome! It won't be long before you're a member of the Little Black Dress club!

name: Sarah Hermetz
text: It has given me a new life style. I wasn't this thin in middle school. I am in a place where I can live a full and healthy lifestyle, not only in my weight but with my self. Thank You Julie!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review of Robertsdale Hypnosis! We are so pleased you are working for your goals.

name: Ron Dumas
text: I am really interested in hypnosis as an alternative to some limited things like diets. I am here to lose weight,, control my state of mind and get more energized and organized. I believe Julie and Robertsdale Hypnosis can and will help me with these challenges and make me a better and happier person. this will Help me be healthier, happier and more focused with a lot less stress.

resp.text: We are most pleased to be here with you, hand-in-hand as you seek a better you! Thanks for trusting us to join you in this decision.

name: Ginny Stopa
text: This is only my fourth session but just last week I put on a bathing suit for  the first time in over two years. I’m also wearing sleeveless tops because of how many inches I’ve lost already. I have found that it takes WAY less food to make be satisfied at each meal and I never feel deprived. I am so glad I found hypnosis-it is easy and so fun. And I get great results.

resp.text: We are so glad you are with us as well! We are excited for your best future yet!

name: Diane Diane
text: In session 1 I was scared - this was unknown to me and I wondered if hypnosis would work for me. By the 2nd session, NINE THINGS had improved or changed for the better! Wow! In session 3 we did a great technique to get me out of dieting thinking and during that, I began to clearly and easily visualize myself as the thin person I want to be. In fact, I put a picture of a thinner me in a BATHING  SUIT in the screen of my phone to remind me where I’m headed. Who would have thought I could come so far in such a short time! Today is session 4, and I told Julie that last week was a little crazy because I actually had a heart attack! I’m fine now, but of course all my friends brought giant piles of food over to hep me recover. It used to be I would have dived in to all of it, especially the sweets. Instead, none of the sweets interested me. It wasn’t that I wanted them but  “couldn’t” or “shouldn’t” have them - I genuinely didn’t want them. That’s gotta be the hypnosis changing my food preferences, and it was so easy. It is working for me. At week 4 I’m feeling so confident in where I’m going. I’m going to be a size 8, and that’s just how it’s going to go!!

resp.text: YAY! Keep going. Your health will continue to improve as long as you focus on the prize and take each day as the amazing opportunity it is!

name: Bill Nassar
text: We are very pleased with the outcome here at Robertsdale Hypnosis with my step son. It was amazing to see how quickly he relaxed - more so than he has been in years.  i was really skeptical at first, but this isn't like on TV! instead, it gives the tools to be more confident and calm. you rally learn how-to relax, and then so many more thipngs are possible. The office is very professional and the people really know what they're doing,  We got the anxiety relief help we were seeking and are very glad we came. Thank you so much!

resp.text: Thank you for trusting us with your relief! It is the highest compliment to know that we placed you at ease and you enjoyed your visit in our office.

name: Ann Morris
text: I knew hypnosis would be the answer because I tried everything else! I smoked for 55 years up until June 6th. That was my first hypnosis session and I stopped smoking forever. I'm very proud of that date. It was so relaxing, and I found out I was aware of everything, and I felt calmly in control the whole time. The thing I like best about being a non-smoker is I have so much more energy and since my mind isn't racing, I can make decisions better. I like to brag, and everybody who knows me has heard me say, "I'm a NON SMOKER!!" Oh, and I've already saved 75% of what it cost just because I'm not buying cigarettes any more. In a year, I'll have enough to take a cruise! This worked so well, I'd do it again tomorrow.

resp.text: Congratulations! Stay with it and don't loose any ground.

name: thegreenantllc Brandy55
text: My grown son has severe anxiety and depression. We took the normal path for treatment and got improvement but he was still unable to live a normal life. We found Julie at Robertsdale Hypnosis and made the decision to see if hypnosis could help.  With only 3 sessions behind us he is much more relaxed and comfortable handling interactions with others. I reccomend anyone suffering from anxiety or other debilitating conditions to give hypnosis a try, it is certainly working for us.

resp.text: Thank you for this word of encouragement! It's so important to note every situation is different and we love recognizing the needs of every client. We are so excited by the path your son is on.

name: Henry Purvis
text: Why is it that when your back locks up and you’re in so much pain you can’t put your boots on or get in and out of your car that they charge you for seeing a doctor but only hand you off to a nurse practitioner who “can’t prescribe pain medication” I have never had any problems with pain medication and never will. I’ve been a few times in the last 7 years I’ve lived in Florence and they’ve always given me a shot and a prescription for flexoril, steroids and a few pain killers. I’m not going to waste my time with these places anymore. Thanks for nothing med plus.

name: Isabella
text: I was in and out within an hour. I saw Dr. Lee and she was very welcoming and warm. I usually come here at least once a year. I’ve never had a bad experience.

name: Rebecca Kent
text: Run, don’t walk, away from here! They never answer the phone. Front desk staff is horrible they don’t wear masks, and they refused to let me see my primary care provider they sent me to the ER , which the ER told me I should have gone to a primary care provider. They sent me away because it was a Friday and I was an inconvenience. The floors are filthy and it is clear they do not clean. I just left and there was blood on the floor in my exam room!!!!! The PA was very nice, but overall a terrible clinic I will not go back.

name: Sabrina Samano
text: So fast. Truly care about their patients. Had different healthcare providers the past two visits & all have been wonderful!

name: Linda Ealey
text:
I've been going here for years and always paid my bills but recently received a threatening letter (during these awful times with the corona where people are losing jobs and have no income by the way!) that claims this is their 3rd time sending me a notice (it's not! it's the 1st) and that if I don't pay the high amount that I can't afford right now, that I'm no longer able to come back and they will send it to collections.

What a great way to treat your long time paying customers, I'm never going back to Med Plus, it's time for me to find a permanent primary care Dr. anyway.

name: tyler inman
text: I have lived in Florence my whole life and it’s sad to see a doctors office like this. They have the WORST customer service and I mean the WORST. Every time I call, they have a terrible attitude. This is the reason I would rather go somewhere else to visit the doctor. The people at the desk are rude in person and over the phone. They hardly pickup the phone when I do call. I have to call 2-3 times for them to even answer. Not to mention I called last night to get antibody tested and they told me to come up there and they would, but when I drove 30 minutes to get there they told me they couldn’t test me and told me to come back at 7am. They did not close for another hour at that time, so the fact that they couldn’t draw my blood is ridiculous. It frustrates me and if anyone is trying to get tested for covid or visit a doctor in Florence, go somewhere else. Med Plus is not a friendly environment and they do not treat patients nicely. If you work at med plus.. do better.

name: Madison Stewart
text:
The staff and physicians here do not care about their patients. They are the most incompetent people I’ve ever had to deal with. Speaking with Brandi the physician after what happened earlier. Hoping to get a resolution but instead. She has no regard for her patients and defends the incompetence of her staff.
They will kill someone if they already haven’t and they will feel no remorse whatsoever. Do not go here if you have the choice!

name: Rachel S
text: Linda Lee is the best doctor I have ever seen! She listens, is empathetic and knows just how to help. She is obviously very intelligent and is the best at helping you feel your best. I strongly recommend her to anyone that feels they aren’t heard or is needing help medically.

name: Elaine Price
text: I would like to thank the MD who was working the evening of 1/23/20. My son needed stitches. She was very compassionate to him and to me. She listened and even hugged both of us. There is more to this story that I don’t want to share publicly, but let’s just say she was a listening ear and a shoulder to cry on when we needed one. She could have just stitched it up and sent us home. But she took the time to connect with us. She made a true difference in our lives that night. We won’t forget. Thank you.

name: Matthew Nowack
text: This review is a follow-up of my visit to this unpleasant establishment. Where do I start with the utter inconvenience of a visit this has been? The phone call: I decided that I would attempt to book an appointment (like a normal human being) and avoid wasting half of my day to be treated for a basic clinical diagnosis. This business doesn’t take appointments for some reason (because they’re stuck in a 1900’s complacency mentality). Thereafter, I walked into the waiting room and there were only 3 visitors in total (including myself). No surprise there, given the fact that this place is a nightmare. I was rudely informed that I needed to fill out administrative work regarding my visit, and I asked if they already had my file (since I have been here before). They continued to explain that my file was old (it wasn’t) and I needed to update information (not true). Around 1 hour later I was informed that INFORMATION was finalized. At this point, I was the only patient waiting for treatment. After a few more minutes of waiting I was finally called into the Patient’s Entrance. Wow, the holy grail of treating a cold/sinus infection has finally gotten prepared to tell me I need a Z-pack. The doctor proceeded to ask me the same 4 questions 3 separate times. They were rude, they were slow, and they didn’t respect me or my time.

name: Allen B
text: Came in with a severe sinus infection.  Went to another clinic the week before and they told me to go home and sweat it out.  By the time I reached med plus, I was in serious pain and could barely talk.  Everyone was very friendly and didn't waste a bunch of my time asking irrelevant questions.  Dr. Grutzik was very thorough and friendly.  Was starting to feel better within a few hours.  My hats off to Dr. Grutzik and med plus.  Job well done 👍.

name: Stephanie Cornatzer
text: Brandi Ray is wonderful she has been truly a lifesaver for my family and even my sister family. She is so awesome!! All the doctors are great and truly care. And also the best nurse in the world Alli works there and my son wont get a shot from anyone else! Lol they are all great!!!

name: WMBW Love
text:
I get a different Dr. every time I visit, I've been back to back,  most of them really don't know what they're doing, every time I go back I'm getting told something completely different.

I wish they would do x-ray, blood work because I feel like I wouldn't have to go back still sick with the same thing over and over, they'd prescribe me meds and then I'll be back sick with the same thing in about 2 months, it's like they're Dr.'s in training and don't know what they're doing.

Even my sister went, she was still sick after they gave her meds so she had to make another appointment (and pay) and get different meds and she's STILL sick!

I'm just going to find a real Dr. else where, it's not worth it staying sick and wasting money on their service if they don't know what they're talking about, none of them!

And all of the ladies in the back have nasty attitudes (the ones that write down your info and check your weight)

They also wouldn't give me a temporary refill on my diabetic medication until I found a  real Dr., so it was pointless and the bills they sent you are so high!!

name: Jordan
text: Doctor Ferguson is fantastic. Always professional and explains everything thoroughly. Sometimes it’s a little bit of a wait but not often. Worth the wait if they are busy

name: Big Hand Dave
text: In and out very quick. I was very impressed with reception staff. They were quick and professional.  The nurse and nurse practitioner was very quick, thorough and professional. I was in and out in alittle over 20 minutes. Thank you. So much

name: Julia Savoie
text: Did not listen to what I had to say whatsoever

name: Rachel Berry
text: Every time I've been here I've been welcomed with open arms. Doctors and nurses are always sympathetic to my needs. They consistently listen to, and consider my symptoms, and take me seriously. 5/5 Would recommend to everyone.

name: Jimi S
text: Brandi Ray is the Nurse Practitioner for General Family Practice there and she is a literal life saver. She is the utmost kind and caring and genuine medical professional I've ever worked with. She takes the time to really listen and address all my concerns no matter how big or small. And when I'm sick she works me in and has even stayed late to see me. If your looking for a Family Medical Provider she's your woman. I am so thankful for her and her guidance.

name: Major League Carpenter
text: Dr. Lee was amazing, made the experience as enjoyable as possible. Very pleased.

name: Mitchell M
text:
I had a very fast visit and the administrative ladies were wonderful. However, the doctor was talking over me and didn't seem interested in hearing what I had to say. Seemed more like he was ready to get me out than give me an accurate diagnosis.
All in all it was an okay experience.

name: Kaylee Walker
text: Dr. Lee was absolutely amazing with our five year old! It’s so nice to have a kind doctor, who truly loves their work! It makes all the difference!

name: Charlie C
text: Dr Lee is great, willing to listen to your concerns. Always a good feeling when seen here. Nurse practitioner and nurses here are great as well.

name: Josh Berry
text: Dr.Lee is one of the best physicians i’ve been too, she is great. Took awhile to get back there though.

name: Casey Corbett
text: Don’t accept Tricare....military and military families, FYSA

name: Paige Montgomery
text: Slowest doctors office I’ve ever been to. It’s not particularly clean, and when I was getting an IV the woman sticking me did not wear gloves and had sparkly long nails. I have never been to a medical establishment that allows employees to have nails. They were rude and dismissed almost everything I said about my own symptoms and body. I will not be coming back, I don’t recommend others be treated here, either.

name: Maha7951 ___
text: the receptionist was so rude oh my goodness i am so beside myself. It's your job to be nice to patients why work there if you're going to be mean?? If i could give it zero stars i would

name: Kristin Hawkins
text:
I had to go in today because of a fall I had, resulting in a shoulder injury today. I had to wait a little over an hour (it's flu season, so that's to be expected) before I got in. One thing that really left a good impression with me was that the receptionist made note that I wasn't sick and pulled me over to another waiting room away from everyone that was showing cold and flu symptoms...I greatly appreciated that, since I'm a germaphobe and have health related anxiety issues.

Dr. Lee is amazing! She has such a bright personality and she's very wise. She was aware I don't have insurance, so she made sure to check my injury to make sure I didn't need an X-ray, so I wouldn't spend the unnecessary money if I didn't have to.

She sat and talked about some personal issues with me and took the time to show me some exercises I could do for my arm and even some breathing techniques I could do for my anxiety issues. She's a great doctor.

Even though I'm sore and hurting, it was still a really good doctor's visit...and I say that as someone who is terrified of going to the doctors office.

name: Taylor Evans
text: Receptionist in this awful establishment was so unprofessional and very rude! Basically started laughing when telling me they couldn’t process my payment method tonight, due to nobody there to process it. I will never go back and she needs to loose her job.

name: Richard Cornatzer
text: Definitly the best walk in medical facility we have around here the staff is always curtious and professional I've never had any problems with this place or the staff and were very thankful to have doctors like brandi ray and dr lee and dr furgeson to help out when your sick

name: Joe Bama
text: Not the same without Good ol dr Ferguson around as much. He is truly best doc we have had. but new staff has really made improvements still go there when needed.

text: I've been using Med Plus since the mid to late 80s. Alway great care. I've received no-nonsense advice, and exceptional care at reasonable cost every time. Much thanks to the doctors and staff.

name: elmer Pierce
text: Staff is awesome and they do not make you wait all day.

name: Chandra Stewart
text: Quicker then the ER. Doctors where nice and listened to why you were there.

name: Avery King
text: I would never return to this walk in clinic. I have never felt so disrespected and dealt with such rude people in a professional setting. I would never suggest this place to anyone. After waiting for 30 minutes to see a doctor, they ask me to leave and come back tomorrow because it was after hours (they closed at 8 pm and I was there with all paperwork completed by 7:40.)  Not impressed with a doctor's office thats so rude.

name: Tracy Biggers
text: Walk in and out quickly.

name: Tim Spidel
text: In & Out! Much quicker than the ER and nice doctors.

name: Kelso Morton
text: The doctors are more than professional & kind .

name: Paige Smith
text: This clinic should be closed, and if they continue on the way they are, they will be very soon. Be forewarned that this tacky little "Walk-in Clinic" refuses to see patients who are 65+.  And I do mean AT ALL. They will not tell you that until they see your insurance card; then they will pretend it is because they do not see Medicare patients/take Medicare.  When I pulled out a credit card (a rather upscale one.... ) and offered to pay for the visit then and there and let's forget about Medicare, the little bozo-ette at the window just kept saying, "It's not my fault, it is just the policy." Well,  of course it is not your fault, little Bozo-ette, nothing ever is with flunkies like you.   I eagerly await, soon, reading in the paper that due to a monstrous lawsuit over ageism, that MedPlus has had to close.  Given other reviews of this nasty little place, they will have to close over a  lot of things.  Please post if you ever see a sign in there that says, "We do not treat Black patients," or "No Hispanics allowed."

text: After my visit I called and left message for the Nurse Practitioner to call me back and she didnt. And it was about the prescription she gave me. I will not be back to see her.

name: Sharon Hill
text: Great Experience! I was referred by  VA. It was absolutely the best. Mr. Hendrix not only gave a excellent massage experience. He also was very knowledgeable about pain management, and targeted the correct areas. I most definitely will return!!

name: Jesica Romano
text:
I recommend my therapist, super affordable, flexible schedule,   i am improving a lot with his recommendations of what to do and what to eat too.
I am able to continue working and my level of pain drop a lot.  Totally recommended him

name: Stephen Ferlita
text: Knowledge is power and this is what you get working with Dan.  I have been battling cancer with conventional medicine but I knew I needed to do more to beat this diseas.  Dan helped me with nutrition and supplements to work side by side with the chemo and also elevate the side effects from the chemo treatment.  He used evidence based studies to guide me for my type of cancer.  He is so knowledgeable about the body inside and out. The best news I am cancer free as of Jan 2019.  He is so passionate and has a great personality.

name: B. Morgan
text: I have been having deep tissue massage from Dan Hendrix for more than 12 years.  He is the best.  Previously used several others but no one has his particular combination of expertise and knowledge of exercise science and nutrition.  My years of being his client should speak volumes about my opinion of his therapy.

name: Patricia Hendrix
text: Dan is very thorough and knowledgeable in massage therapy techniques as well as nutrition, personal training and yoga instruction. He takes the time to provide his clients with the most recent medically evidenced- based information available and takes a very holistic and caring approach. An extraordinary practitioner.

name: Terrell Clark
text: I've been to 4 or 5 massage therapists in the Prattville/Montgomery area and my experience with Dan Hendrix was by far the best I've had. Dan is knowledgeable about muscles and their functions which allows him to massage the body adequately. He takes the time out to work with his clients and gives them tips that can be used at home. Dan has more than 30 years of experience and he knows how to customize his massage to his clients needs. I highly recommend Dan Hendrix because of his professionalism and extensive knowledge.

name: renea johnston
text: After being on crutches for five weeks because of a tibial plateau fracture in my leg, my back was thrown out due to my body misalignment.  The pain in my back made me immobile.  Dan Hendrix went over and above to repair the injury to my back.  With his therapy, I was able to move again, pain-free, within a week. name: Leslie Boyd
text:
We are so pleased with the results from our visits with Dr Mix.

My infant daughter failed her newborn hearing screening at the hospital, and at her 2 mo check up. She was diagnosed with having excess fluid on and around the eardrum, a condition which causes hearing loss and typically causes ear infections. We had taken her to an ENT and pediatrician, and both recommended surgery to put tubes in to help drain the fluid off her eardrum.

After her diagnosis, we visited Dr Mix twice a week for adjustments at approx 2 months old. In only a months time, we have seen vast improvement.  Her last ENT visit was a couple of days ago. She finally passed her hearing exam for the very first time in both ears!!! There is still a small amount of fluid remaining, but our ENT detected a noticable reduction in the amount, and has postponed the need for tubes.

We will continue to seek weekly treatment with Dr Mix, and are so happy that his treatments allowed us a non-invasive approach to restore our  baby's hearing. Dr Mix has been wonderful to work with through such a difficult time. He has taken extra care to go over computer readings with us that have  conclusively shown the gradual improvement at each stage as well. My daughter  has smiled and cooed through every adjustment (no, they don't hurt AT ALL). As a side benefit, one of the computer screenings showed she also had a vertabrae out of alignment which can affect digestion as well. After her adjustments we have also seen improvement in this area also.

Parents, DO NOT HESITATE to schedule an appointment for your babies and children at this office. Both Dr Mix and Yvonne are wonderful to work with, and show genuine concern for us at each visit. The office is super clean, and has very up to date equipment too. We have never had long wait times, even when we have stopped by unexpectedly without an appointment, and the waiting room was full. I am so happy we "discovered" Discover Chiropractic.

If your into serious lifting I would totally recommend this place. They do a fantastic job of helping me pick out the right supplements and we went over ingredients. Didnt try to upsell me on anything and some things were actually put back on the shelf because he believed I wouldn't need them for my goals. 10/10

resp.text: Thanks for the review!

name: Bryan Whatley
text: I can’t say enough for the products and people who own the place and work there.  Matt and Bengi really know their products and offer top quality supplements to get you where your goals require.  Whether you are bulking, cutting, or sustaining, into endurance or various sports, or just wanting to feel better in your daily life,  you can’t go wrong with stopping by and chatting, trying free samples before you buy, and protecting your wallet by the great prices and specials.  Trust me when I say, you don’t want to just be fit, but fit to the max, with MaxFit!

name: Candace Howard
text: Great place for all your fitness and health needs. Matt knows his stuff!

name: Jaye J
text: Excellent customer service and knowledgeable about the products..

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words.

name: Millie Tizol
text: Great quality products!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Heather Cole
text: I moved from Nashville almost 2 years ago and immediately looked for a hot yoga studio. This studio far exceeded my expectations! I’ve enjoyed every class I’ve been to.  I appreciate the variety they offer and the knowledge of each instructor I’ve practiced with. From kickboxing and barre to traditional yoga classes, I’ve been challenged from each one. The facilities are clean and welcoming! You won’t be disappointed trying out a class!

name: Functional Chiropractic
text: This place is great.  I have been doing hot yoga for 15 years.  This has become my favorite place.  One thing I love is the variety of styles and classes.  I send people here all the time because you can easily start as a beginner or be just as easily be challenged if you have been practicing hot yoga for years.

name: Whitney Painter
text: I love this place! I cannot say enough about how knowledgeable the instructors are and willing to help. They are very skilled and masters of their trade. I have recommended this place to my friends, who love it too! Great place:)

name: Tarun Gupta
text: I have been going to HYOH since 2013. This studio is amazing! It provides a perfect ambience for Hot Yoga. The instructors are genuinely there to help you. They have classes for all levels. Great place to make life long friends. With new ownership, sky is the limit! I wholeheartedly recommend this studio. Give it a try, you will be glad you did!

name: Teri Hasemeyer
text: I am loving all the amazing positive changes going on here at HYOH. I have come here since the studio opened in 2010 or so, and the teachers and staff and ownership are just getting higher quality and kinder and even better customer service. I highly recommend hot yoga and highly recommend this studio!

name: Beth Guthrie
text:
I recently had my first experience with Hot Yoga at this studio, and walked in not knowing what to expect. I have a couple of co-workers who were very enthusiastic about practicing hot yoga and said that this was the place to go - I was not disappointed.

The owner of the studio was in conversation with another student when I came in, but made sure to greet me and make me feel welcome. There was a very brief form that I had to fill out with basic information to help the staff make sure you're prepared for your experience, and then after a brief tour I entered for my first hot yoga class.

The class itself was awesome, and was a challenge - but I noticed that because of the room being heated I didn't experience as much tension in my muscles as we worked through the poses. The instructor was very willing to help accommodate those of us who couldn't enter certain poses, and she was also quite helpful in adjusting form or making suggestions on how to modify your pose to get the most out of it.

Between the welcoming staff/instructors, pleasant atmosphere, and variety of yoga classes offered, I will DEFINITELY be back again!

name: Chung-thuy Pham
text:
I loved my experience at this studio!! I think the $20 introductory month is such an incredible value. I took advantage of this and went to as many as 4 classes in one week!

Seek out the classes with Neal or Megan if you can. The classes with these instructors are tough, but Neal and Megan will help you get into the correct form and alignment. They will also help talk you through how to get into and improve on the more difficult poses. They're both very kind and encouraging =)

Unfortunately, I live 30 mins away from the studio and with my college student budget I won't be able to continue classes here. Once my budget allows it, I would love to come back and take classes here again!

name: Ciara Holmes
text: Just moved to the area back in June and have been trying to find a hot yoga studio. Did a lot of scouring in the area and come to find out there aren’t a whole lot of options. Decided to give this studio a try. Took a Yin class with Kris. The class was ok. She talked a lot during the class which I thought was slightly frustrating, her instructions could have been better, and she was on her phone for the most part. The studio was nice, the space however I don’t think is meant for a hot yoga studio persay. The hot aspect is where I felt like the studio fell short. Granted it was just a warm class, the warmth wasn’t consistent, and that may be due to the fact it’s forced heat. I was wanting to sweat and do yoga, I barely broke a sweat. I couldn’t find anywhere on the website or mind and body where they specify what type of heat they have going on.

name: Alex Cross
text: I'm confused. Is this a dog kennel or yoga studio. I came here to do yoga and the first few times were fine. Then last night there were dogs everywhere. I dont want to put my bare feet on dog urine.I shouldn't have to take my shoes off and walk on the same floor that dogs use the bathroom on. Leave the dogs at home.

name: Bailee Barrilleaux
text: I have done regular yoga before and  was curious about this 'Hot Yoga' place. One of my friends convinced a group of us to go and I loved it! I thought I would be uncomfortable in the heat, but I adapted to it and barely noticed by the end! After my class, I felt refreshed and not as tired and/or worn out as I expected, but i still felt like i had a good work out. Also, the teachers were very patient and kind to beginners, such as myself, so do not worry if you have never done yoga before! I  recommend taking a class to everyone!

name: Elizabeth Duling
text: Love this place!  They are encouraging and every time I go I love it more!  Plus sometimes you get to see cute puppies too!

name: Liz Helton Bullard
text: The manager was rude and condescending to me when I went to try my first class, so much so that I wanted to leave and drive back the 20 minute drive that I made out there to enjoy a workday evening yoga class. I arrived to the studio ten minutes before class, and the manager proceeded to lecture me for almost ten minutes about "being late" and "interrupting others in their practice," when, if she had let me go into the room, I would not have been late at all. She insisted that I fill out forms that I had just previously filled out online when I signed up for the class online earlier in the day. The forms asked for all of the exact information (emergency contact, address, experience with yoga...) that had been filled out extensively on the online form, but she made it out to be that I was neglecting a step and trying to casually sidle in late. There were only six or so people in the class, and the manager's lecturing brought me into class about 1 minute late. She reminded me as I went in that "this is Huntsville; it's different." My address lists that I am from Chattanooga, and I don't know if she was trying to make some comment about the caliber and status of clientele attending Huntsville studios as opposed to Chattanoooga ones, or not... but I can say that I am much more impressed with every Chattanooga studio I've been to than this one, which just left a bad taste in my mouth with its snobbery :/ The class was completely unremarkable, sadly. I'd had high hopes for it, especially after the huge deal that the manager made about entering late.

name: Ria Ghosh
text: Best yoga studio in town! Clean studio! Lovely & knowledgeable teachers!

name: Kathryn Story
text:
Clean, Innovative, Inspiring, Enlightening...

What a wonderful addition to Huntsville! <3

name: Streeter Michael
text: I have been doing yoga for many years and I have been practicing Ashtanga, bikram, vinaysa flow, and yoga nidra ect. Robyn and here staff provide a very strong practice and challenging atmosphere. Just like anything else you get out of it what you put in. This place is yoga I know this because I come from a studio in Hilton Head South Carolina at the Jiva yoga center where they teach yoga and the philosophy of yoga. Yoga saved my life and it started in Hilton Head and now I can continue it at the hot yoga center. In closing I just want you to know I start yoga at almost 300 lbs and over a three year period I lost 86 lbs. At the age of 44 I am in the best shape of my life and better then when I was in Special operations with the US Army Rangers.

name: Brad G
text: Great studio with heat and humidity. Instructors work with you (I'm a newbie) and keep the class moving along and enjoyable.

name: Whitney Sirten
text: Love them!!!

name: Janice Kluge
text:
I have been a client at “Chambers Total Body” for a decade and have recommended Mr. Chambers many times. During the time of Covoid he invested in safety precautions above and beyond. He continues to keep sterile environment and his individual attention for personal training is outstanding! There is 30 minutes between clients- for complete turnover.

I was in the studio when the two men came in that gave the ONE star review. They walked right in and did not say anything to the owner. They had materials in their arms that made them look like SALES PEOPLE. And that happens a lot! A LARGE SIGN IS ONTHE DOOR to wear a MASK! Anyone who would give a review like that- after just walking in without calling ahead and already breaking rules- is not really the type of person who comes to workout in this location. I have met many clients over the years. That review was just completely UNFAIR and should be deleted.

name: Meaux La Soule
text: extremely rude when me and a friend walked in just to ask about his services. immediately shoo’d us out of the door like we didn’t belong there. it ruined my day and i won’t be going back.

resp.text: I'm sorry your interpretation of our interaction was that you don't belong here and that you were treated rudely. Our business has clear signage stating, face coverings required. The health and well-being of our clients are extremely important and it's our responsibility to keep the space in which we work as safe as possible for them.  While, It's unfortunate that this rating is reflective of your experience it is in no way reflective of our services.

name: Gary Roubin
text:
Marlon Chambers is the consummate professional trainer. Whether you are 40 or 70y., physical activity is the key to longevity and quality of life. Marlon is able to formulate a circuit of exercises to tune up your core, strengthen your lower extremities and for men," keep you shoulders wider than your waist". And he mixes it up! The workouts match your increasing fitness, your mood on the day and the inevitable appearance of irritated joints and muscles. If consistency is you goal, you will enjoy the experience and be disappointed when you have to miss a session.
As an Interventional Cardiologist, I have a professional interest in fitness and health. I have been working with personal trainers for 30 years. Marlon is the best!

name: Val Walton
text: I am very thankful I have Marlon Chambers as a personal trainer. He is a great motivator and a testament that you do not have to have a hard, drill sergeant attitude to get fitness results. Chambers Total Body, LLC has one-on-one regimens that are designed to do what its name says work your "total body." You will see results, provided you do the work.

name: Anna Schmidt
text: I've been training with Marlon for 3 years now.   Along the way, I've had some major health challenges that Marlon has been instrumental in helping me through.   I'm now strong, agile, slim, and most importantly able to do all those things in life that I really love.  I really appreciate the one on one focus and the way he has individualized a very core-focused program for me.  He even puts my favorite music on and has it ready for me when I walk in.  The facility is immaculately clean and well kept.  The atmosphere is professional and comfortable.  I highly recommend Chambers to anyone considering personal training.  You won't be disappointed.

name: Jimmy Adams
text: Marlon Chambers is a great trainer, working to style the workouts to the client's needs. I have been working out with him Marlon for almost two years and enjoy it. Marlon is also very friendly, and funny frankly. I highly recommend him.

name: john nixon
text: I loss 20 pounds in the first month and the training has improved my energy level.  Marlon is a well trained professional . I highly recommend Chambers Total Body.

name: Paige Daniel
text: My husband and I are long-term clients of Chambers Total Body.  The customized programs and one on one attention is great in helping you meet your goals.

name: Jessica Wilkes
text: This gym is great! Best combination of challenging workouts and patient/ skilled coaching, the best crossfit gym around!

name: S F
text: The best gym in town with the most knowledgeable coaches to get you in the best shape possible!

name: Harrison Horton
text: As a 5-year Crossfit athlete that is a certified coach and has visited countless Crossfit gyms across the country, I will tell you that ALL IN Crossfit is a great community of like-minded individuals looking to improve their level of fitness along with the confidence they have in themselves. On top of the great workouts and coaching that you will get on a daily basis they offer many out of the gym events that help build camaraderie within the gym. Before making my decision on which gym to join, I visited each Crossfit gym in the area. I ended up choosing ALL IN because they were the ONLY gym that bothered to return my phone call and offered to show me around the gym before I made my decision. ***ALSO, ignore the unjustified 1-star reviews from people who obviously have no supporting evidence to back their claims.***

name: Mike Cahill
text: This is an AWESOME gym!  Great coaches.  Great folks.  A real feeling of community.  Athletes that encourage and push one another and have fun doing it!  Don't waste your time looking anywhere else...come join us at ALL IN Crossfit and get "Better Than Yesterday!"

name: Bert Schulingkamp
text: Started going here when I started college and would come home for the breaks. When I moved back home to auburn I was in search of a gym to get me back in shape and that offered a sense of community. All In has done an amazing job of getting me back on track with my fitness and offered not only a community but a family. I am thankful for the amazing coaches and members at All In and wouldn't go anywhere else.

name: Kyle Donaghey
text: Exceptional place, people, and experience.  I started going in April 2013 when I was new to Auburn and I can say 4 years later that was one of the best decisions I've ever made.  All In has given me much more than just a fitness experience (although they are great at that too); I've found friends through the coaches and members and made connections that have helped me both personally and professionally.  The business model is pretty unique in the fitness industry; you can pay as you go (which is how I started) so you are not bound to any long term contracts.  As far as the actual workouts go, All In changed working out for me from a chore to something I look forward to and enjoy, and is often the highlight of my day.

name: Anthony Dean
text: Outstanding! Great people! Amazing workouts. Absolutely top notch

name: Kanesha Blake
text: I could not say more great things about All In!! All In has the BEST community in Auburn, hands down. All of the coaches and members are awesome and make the atmosphere SO welcoming & enjoyable!! Great workout. Great people. Knowledgeable coaches.  All In is the way!!! #BETTERThanYesterday

name: Katherine Israel
text: Great gym! The coaches are fun and knowledgable and the members are supportive no matter what your level of fitness is at that time.  Walking in the door helps you be "better than yesterday"!

name: Brent Miller
text: I have been a member of All In CF for 3 years and could not picture going anywhere else. Chris Harris and Shelby Levy, along with the other coaches will teach you and push you to be a better you. Love my All In family!!

name: Ken Natori
