name: S Kirkland
text: I love the coaches here. They are very helpful and experienced. I highly recommend ALL IN with no hesitations.

name: Robin Roberts
text: If you are looking at trying crossfit, look no further.  I have been a member of a All In since it opened and couldn't imagine being anywhere else.  Stop by for a great workout and the opportunity be a part of an amazing community of athletes!!

name: Stephanie Huff
text: I love All In Crossfit! The coaches are the best!Whatever your fitness level is, they will help you and encourage you to be better than yesterday!

name: Libba Brannon Harris
text: I love ALL IN! It's a welcoming and friendly environment. The coaches are super friendly and very knowledgeable.

name: Maddie G.
text: Unknowingly was put on the "auto pay" system when I specifically asked to be charged to go for ONE month. I even double checked to make sure I wasn't on auto pay, because a friend told me that is how it works. A worker went online to my account and said, "thank you for telling me you don't want to be on auto pay, because you were. I will take you off." They DID NOT take me off. When I called and asked for a refund, they said that it was my fault and did not give me my money back!! Poor customer service. Put themselves before the customer first. Was really surprised and frustrated that they did not give me my money back and acted like everything was my problem.

resp.text: We pride ourselves in treating our customers like we want to be treated and will gladly cancel anyone's membership if we receive written notification within 7 days of their bill date. Our policy is clearly stated on the waiver our customers sign when they become a member. This customer was on our auto-pay system for six months before she contacted us asking for a refund. Out of courtesy, we refunded her one month of membership fees. We regret that she thinks she was treated unfairly, but we were only enforcing the policies we have in place and that were agreed to by her when she signed up.

name: Kathryn Gullatte
text: Great coaches, fantastic get pumped music, And people who have a passion for fitness!

name: Tracy Young
text: Knowledgeable coaches, clean gym, super people! I highly recommend!

name: Taylor Cooper
text: The coaches are fantastic and the atmosphere is very welcoming! The best box in Auburn.

name: john Israel
text: Great Gym for all ages.

name: Jon Lubin
text: After 3 weeks with Shaping-U...the results are in! The staff does an outstanding job not just with my workouts...but my full nutritional and dietary plan as well. I challenge anyone to find a better value for your dollar. Very pleased and thankful I found this Personal workout. If you have ever considered using one...you cannot go wrong with SHAPING-U! 100% Recommend!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the positive feedback Jon! We work hard to take care of our clients and get them to their results!

name: VIRIDIANA HUBBARD
text:
I had heard of Shaping U for years but never thought I would actually need personalized assistance in working out. I would get memberships in other places but never really go, and when I went I never pushed myself to where I needed to be at.

Now I live further from Shaping U, but after carefully considering other gyms, I decided to check it out. I spoke to several of my friends who were/are members and I only received positive feedback.

The Shaping U team has been amazing, as well as the other gym members. Unfortunately with other gyms I didn't feel like I fit in and it's probably due to the fact that I really did not know what I was doing.

I had never received assistance from a personal trainer and my only regret is that I did not do this sooner. I pass countless gyms, and I attend at 7 am, and I am still motivated to go. I never thought I would ever say that I really enjoy this.

I'm not just getting the personal training to make sure I have the right form, but also coming up with a meal plan is incredible. I would have never thought that I could do this and I am. The trainers are amazing, they are there for ME. I don't even need to figure out what I need to do next, that is what they are there for and has been extremely beneficial.

I'm a 45 yrs female, I'm very busy with work, and because I am working from home at the moment, being able to get out to a safe and friendly environment means the world to me.

Joining Shaping U has been the best thing I have ever done for myself. I feel that I belong, I feel valued, and I know that they are there for my best interest.

Thank you!!!

name: Lily Stone
text: I love this place

name: Olivia jee
text: Great Experience with Shaping U fitness. Expert and knowledgeable staff!! All the trainers provide training in an ultimate and unique way. I really love this gym as I achieved desired health results. They also provide a diet plan which is very helpful for fitness. I would definitely suggest this gym to every health conscious. Highly Recommended!

name: Gregor Rex
text: No other gym in Birmingham can beat Shaping U. Their personalized experts do a fantastic job. I will never forget my experience with them. Completely removed my high blood pressure disease. Their every day workout tips are unmarked. I enjoyed every moment in Shaping U. I appreciate the whole team staff. Widely recommended!

resp.text: Thank you Gregor! Glad we left an impression...please come back when time allows! :)

name: Elise Montgomery
text:
I walked into Shaping U Fitness 6 weeks ago, fed up with how things were, knowing that I needed a change, not just a quick fix but a lifestyle change. Brad was super helpful with explaining the meal plan. Everything makes sense, and it won’t break the bank.

The trainers have worked me hard, pushed me beyond what I thought I could do. I went from having to convince myself to go in during the initial two weeks to looking forward to going after work. The woman who walked into the gym 6 weeks ago is gone, replaced by a stronger, more confident woman.

It’s a relatively small gym with group training sessions. Everyone is very encouraging and helpful. I know the “regulars” for my preferred time slot, not something I got from a larger gym. And when I missed one of my regular  days the accountability coach would check in on me. I really feel like part of the Shaping U family.

My 6 week challenge may be over, but I’m not done. I highly recommend Shaping U!

resp.text: Thank you sooo much for these kind words...you have done an amazing job with us...looking forward to helping you for much longer in the future! :)

name: James clark
text: The trainers here are extremely supportive. The ambience over here is very positive. The day since I have joined Shaping U, I have noticed remarkable improvement in my health. I am really happy to be a part of this gym!

resp.text: Wow...thanks James! We are looking forward to a long healthy relationship! :)

name: Carolina Lecaros
text:
(Translated by Google) Shaping U Fitness is what I was looking for years! It’s more than just a gym, they do more than just shape your body! They shape your mind and change your lifestyle. This is what has happened to me since my first day!
Brad and his great crew are always there to help, to motivate, to advise, to challenge, and to take care of us anytime creating a new and better version of ourselves! They are amazing!

name: Matt Rolling Star (MattRollingStar)
text:
I'm not giving this low score based solely off the amenities provided at the gym (although a laughable number of machines were broken or in a state of shoddy repair) but rather the pitiful customer service I received. A friend of mine and I used the Snap Pass feature to get a paid trial of this gym and weren't really feeling the features provided and the fact it was a little bit of a drive for us.

So we kept the pass and planned to cancel. A week before our memberships were set to auto-renew we tried to get it touch with whoever operated this gym to cancel our memberships since the official website directed us to. We made multiple calls to the gym with no response or return calle and I sent several e-mails trying to see about cancelling. No actual response BUT I did receive a blank e-mail from them which tells me that they have seen my attempts to reach out them. They have already billed my account so I can be confirmed of one thing:

Whoever operates this gym is not in the business of self improvement but rather thievery. I wholeheartedly cannot recommend this gym to any person unless they have a desire to feel the sting of being swindled or receiving the worst customer service ever. A disreputable and disgusting business.

name: Jessica Rogers
text:
I really used to love this quaint little gym.  It's easy to get to and not super crowded and the equipment does what I need it to do.....BUT ever since the new owners bought it last year, it's gone downhill quickly.  Repairs are never made to equipment, unless one of the trainers takes it upon themselves to do it.

Two elliptical machines have had "Maintenance has been called" for over 9 months now.  Their idea of repairing pads from normal wear and tear is to use matching duct tape to cover the rips.  AC is constantly going out and the latest insult to injury is that the power has been out in the cardio and classroom for at least 4 days now.  One treadmill and a couple of bikes work.

I really love the convenience of the gym and most of the people that go there are nice and friendly and the two ladies that I've seen working there are always nice.  I keep hoping that one day enough will be enough and they'll put some money back into the gym, but..........

name: Chris Bouldin
text: I met Dr. Mailapur when my wife decided to have the gastric sleeve. She wanted us the have the surgery done at the same time, but I was very skeptical of it. I watched my wife do fantastic with it and is still crushing it. That and a health scare is what helped me in making my decision to have the surgery. During this time, Dr. Mailapur was always very supportive and continued to encourage me to consider the surgery for not just me but for my family. I had the gastric sleeve surgery the Friday before Labor Day 2020. I weighted 384lbs on the day of surgery. I had tried many many times on my own to loose weight with me actually weighing at my heaviest 425lbs. The lowest I was ever able to get to was 371lbs but slowly gained it back to my weight before surgery. Since surgery I have lost 80lbs and just finished my first ever 5k this past weekend. I’ve never wanted to run unless something was chasing me or I was running to get in line to eat. Now I run with my family to stay healthy and be around for a long time. I cannot say how thankful I am for Dr. Mailapur for all his help and encouragement.

name: Larry A
text: I have a huge regret about getting the Gastric Sleeve surgery with Dr. Mailapur. My huge remorse is I did not do it years ago because of fear! Being referred by my heart doctor to Dr. Mailapur was an absolutely lifesaving experience.  I had Gastric Sleeve surgery in November of 2020. I am now down over 125 pounds and still losing weight. It was like carrying around over two 60 pound sacks of concrete!  My goal is to lose about 160 pounds. The new way of living and using the tool given to me by Dr. Mailapur has transformed my life. I was taking 225 units of insulin a day. Now I don’t take any insulin! I was taking four 500mg of Metformin a day. Now I don’t take any! I was taking two 20mg blood pressure pills. Now I take one 2.5 mg. I feel SO much healthier. Before my surgery I could not get up off the floor/ground without a chair to help me get back up. It is hard to describe the difference in how much healthier I feel. The energy level, mood, aches and pains are so improved. My family doctor has been encouraging me to have the surgery for years. I was just too scared. BUT, my A1C was climbing, my insulin needs were climbing, heart issues were getting lots worse, and my weight was out of control. I had to get help. My heart doctor recommended I have the surgery and said he would only sign for Dr. Mailapur to be my surgeon. He totally trusted him as a surgeon.  I was also blessed that during my surgery Dr. Mailapur found a rare Cancer in my stomach and removed it ALL. According to the Cancer Doctor (Dr. Mailapur sent me to) in about 48 months I would of had stage 4 stomach cancer. I had a hernia Dr. Mailapur also removed/repaired during my surgery. The first few days were a little tough.  BUT, I left the need and desire to constantly eat in the OR at the hospital. My relationship with food addiction has totally changed.  I was encouraged by several people that had the bariatric sleeve surgery to get the surgery. Each one seemed to want to tell me I needed to do it. One offered to carry me. I now understand why they wanted to share this enormous life change with me. It is such a good positive change and blessing in my life. I, myself, now want to share it with others! You want other to have this exciting progressive change in their lives. Dr. Mailapur and everyone in his office has supported me through this journey. I was truly blessed to have this great compassionate team provide me a tool that has literally saved my life!  Thank you Dr. Mailapur and Amanda! And, Jessica for answering all my email questions!  Thanks to all my doctors and staff that helped me, encouraged me and supported me!

resp.text:
Awesome review Larry. Thx a lot for taking the time to write such an excellent review😃🙏. You did it as promised.

Congratulations on your excellent success and great use of the “TOOL”

Regards,

Dr. Mailapur

name: Jeremy Holley
text:
I would highly recommend Ravindra Mailapur and his office staff.   Between the information seminars, the appointments, and pre-op nutrition class, they take the time to ensure that potential patients learn about the types of surgeries that are offered and the pros and cons of each.  Additionally, the pre-op nutrition class and follow up appointments in particular do a great job of informing you of the needed dietary, medical, behavioral, and lifestyle changes that are necessary to properly maintain your health.

It's been a year since I underwent surgery with Dr. Mailapur.  The surgery went extremely well and I have had no complications with it.  At this point, I have lost 105 lbs from my highest weight pre-surgery.  I am within five pounds of my goal weight of 175 lbs.   This has been lost due to the combination of the realities of the changes made to my diet and eating habits from surgery and my resumption of an active lifestyle.

Bariatric surgery may not be for everyone, but it is a great tool to help you to either reclaim a level of health that you once may have had or to challenge yourself to make a positive change for the first time.   I am nearly 45 years old, but I feel the best that I've felt since my early 20s.  I run regularly and I've started to take martial arts classes with my kids.   I don't feel as tired any more.  If you do struggle with weight loss, I would encourage you to look contact this office and inform yourself.

resp.text:
Thx Jeremy for taking the time to write such an excellent and detailed review😃🙏. I certainly appreciate it very much. You have done exceptionally well and I am extremely proud of you and your supportive family🎉🎊🎈. Keep it up.

Dr. Mailapur

text:
Dr. Mailapur performed a Vertical Sleeve Gastrectomy October 21, 2020. He is a wonderful surgeon with terrific bedside manner, and he really cares about his patients. He scheduled follow up appointments for me all the way through 2022 which allowed me to put in for all the dates at work for time off. And he calls just to check up intermittently just to make sure I'm doing well.

I was up to 280 at one point, then dropped to 180, back up to 242. I was taking so much medication,  35 pills a day,  two different types of insulin daily and one type once weekly. Since the surgery I've come off all but one of my medications. I have dropped from 242 to 200 pounds, and  from a 42 inch waist to a 36 inch waist all in under 3 months.

I would highly recommend that anyone considering weight loss surgery go to see Dr. Mailapur. He really helped change my life for the best.

name: Christopher Gregory
text:
On November 13,2013 I chose to have gastric bypass surgery. My heaviest weight recorded was 650 lbs. Dr Mailapur and his staff along with the staff of the bariatrics department of Huntsville Hospital were a life saver. I had to lose 200 lbs before my surgery. Since my sleeve surgery I have lost a total of 430 lbs. Dr Mailapur tells every one “ I can only offer the tools in which to lose weight “ you have to use them.
So I never started out being a morbidly obese man. I was and have been heavy for most of my life. In 2003 I suffered a massive herniation of L 3,L4 sciatic nerve damage and drop foot syndrome. In 2003 I weighed 300-325 on average. But due to the herniation, nerve damage and drop foot , I ate. Being a chef by trade I knew how to cook food. I also knew  how to eat.  I had my 7 year check up with Dr. Mailapur this morning and I have achieved 83% weight loss. Anything over 80% is a huge achievement but it is never without the ups and downs. If your just wanting information or you have made the decision to have gastric bypass surgery .... I personally think that Dr. Mailapur and his staff along with Huntsville Hospitals staff will be an excellent choice for your surgical needs.

resp.text: Thx a lot. Congratulations 🎉🎊🎈. That is truly an great story and amazing success with weight loss 😃🙏

name: Bronson McLain
text: Dr. Mailapur performed my Gastric Sleeve in March of 2017 and it has been one of the greatest decisions I have ever made!  I struggled with being overweight my whole life, as has most of my family.  I got to the point where I knew enough was enough and I was ready for help.  I went on Google and began doing research on bariatric surgeons in Huntsville and everything that I could find pointed to Dr. Mailapur as being the best!  And from my experience, that is ABSOLUTELY the case!  I have recommended many people to him after my surgery and they have since had theirs done as well, including my wife.  It has changed both of our lives for the better!  Not just physically, but more mentally than anything!  Dr. Mailapur and his staff go above and beyond with you to make sure that you know absolutely everything you need to know before and after your surgery and what you need to do.  It's now been four years since my sleeve and I almost can't remember what it was like to be that guy that first walked into his office at 317 pounds.  In just 9 months after my surgery I lost 125 pounds and have settled at 100 pounds down!  This is what I tell people all the time about having the sleeve done...if you're thinking about it, STOP and just do it!  And, do yourself a favor to see Dr. Mailapur!  The other surgeons in town are great too.  But, none of them go to as much lengths to make sure that you are educated and protected.  Even doing extra tests during surgery to make sure that everything is good!  And, the fact that Dr. Mailapur gets the exact same surgical team every time says something!  He's known as the best and he gets the privileges and respect as being the best.  Dr. Mailapur also removed my gallbladder a couple months ago and it was the easiest surgical experience that I've had; even during COVID.  Trust me!  You can't go wrong with Dr. Mailapur and his staff.  You know it's a good atmosphere when you never see any turnover in the staff!  It's been the same people since I've been going there!  Amber, Jessica, Amanda...all of them awesome!  It's like going to see my friends at every annual checkup!

resp.text:
Wow Bronson. I am truly honored by such a thorough and excellent review. GOD bless you😃🙏. Appreciate it very much.

Great job and congratulations on your awesome success. Keep it up.

Dr. Mailapur

I'm, a healthcare provider myself and work with many surgeons.  I chose Dr. Mailapur because of his excellent skills and I would recommend him highly to anyone considering this route.  My biggest regret is not having this done a LONG time ago.  I feel so much better and it's really fun running into folks I haven't seen in a while and they don't recognize me!?!?!?! name: Danielle's Journey Through 30's
text:
So far, so good. The staff is friendly and they get you back super quick.
My husband had a possible hernia so my family physician recommended Dr. Mailapur. Dr Mailapur is very friendly and I feel he tries to listen to his patients concerns and explain things. I do ask a ton of questions and I try to understand everything. Dr Mailapur did ct scans and was very thorough. Turns out, my husband doesn't have a hernia after all! That's amazing news! I, however, have been having pain since I was a teenager from some lumps around my waist and in my hips. These lumps have only gotten larger and more painful as the years have went on. I explained them to Dr Mailapur and he said to make an appointment to see him. I'm so glad I did! He listened to me, carefully and examined me. These tumors (lipomas) are FINALLY coming out! A doctor FINALLY listened to me, about them and understood. 🙌 He explained the quick procedure throughly and the complications that can come with it and I have full faith in Dr Mailapur's medical knowledge.

Update: The surgery went well and I am recovering nicely. A little sore but nothing that wasn't expected. Dr. Mailapur was thourough and removed everything that was bothering me plus sent the lipomas to be tested. I am beyond happy and excited to go back and see him in a few weeks.

resp.text:
Thx Danielle. Wow that is a very thorough and detailed review. Appreciate it very much 😃🙏.

Regards,

Dr. Mailapur

name: April Shields
text:
Thanks to Dr. Malipur, I am on the path to reset and rediscover myself and my life!! Not only is Dr. Malipur competent and knowledgeable, he's also passionate about his work with his patients.  He's a doctor who truly cares and wants to see his patients succeed.

Upon meeting, Dr. Malipur, he patiently answered all of my questions,  put my fears at ease and assured me that I was making the best decision for my life. After all, what did I really have to lose? I was 5ft 230lb, pre-diabetic, hypertension, asthmatic among other health issues. His team made sure that I was adequately prepared from the first day of consultation up to the very day of surgery.

My VSG was performed on 10/5/2020 without any complications whatsoever.  He also performed a hiatal hernia repair which had previously caused me problems as well. To date, I've lost over 50% of my excess body weight, my asthma symptoms have significantly improved. I normally need my inhaler this time of year but haven't used it since October. My BP is normal, my symptoms of sleep apnea have improved (no daytime sleepiness) and my energy level is consistently up throughout the day.

If you're considering WLS, don't think yourself out of a decision that could potentially save your life. And most importantly, I highly recommend Dr. Malipur for any WLS procedure. - A. Shields

text:
Dr. Mailapur perfumed surgery on me on March 4th 2013 but his excellent, far above standard, level of care neither started nor ended there. Dr. Mailapur is a very quick moving man which was great for getting in and out for visits and checkups, but no matter how fast he was going I never left without understanding everything discussed. I can't seem to remember a time that Dr. Mailapur failed to ask no-less than 3 times if I had any more question. Almost to the level of, "Please ask me questions so I know you understand". I am writing this review as I near my 3 year post-op date and, though my regular visits have ended, anytime that he see me, or even a family member, he ask if things are continuing to go well and offers encouragement or even a "kick in the pants" if needed.

If I were to sum up what an experience with Dr. Mailapur and his office is like it would be: You will leave feeling safe, informed, and cared for!

I strongly urge you to make an appointment to see Dr. Mailapur TODAY.  It will change your life forever.

Dave Treshansky

name: Nathan Luster
text: Not a bad place to work out. It's clean and open 24/7 which is great. Only negative drawback is that a lot of times people come in and and sit on work out equipment for long amounts of time while they check their phone without actually working out. Everyone's allowed to work out however they choose obviously. However, it gets a little frustrating when you want to be in and out of the gym in less than an hour but people are taking up pieces of equipment for over 15-20 minutes while they play on their phone.

resp.text: Thanks Nathan! If there's anything we can do to earn five stars, let us know! We are always striving to improve and learn how we might better serve our members.

name: Christopher Peters
text: Best gym in the Birmingham area hands down!

resp.text: Thanks Christopher! Great to hear!!

text: Clean, good selection of equipment, and awesome staff.  24 hr access so you can choose anytime you need to go

resp.text: Thanks Tyler! We greatly value having you as a member here!

name: Clay Sorensen
text: Absolutely amazing environment! The people are always so inviting. Gerard Younger is an asset to 24e! He is always excited to help! Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thanks Justin! So glad to have you at 24e and knowing you are enjoying it! If we can earn five stars let us know! Customerservice@24ehealthclubs.com

name: josh baty
text:
I have been a member here now for a little over 3 years and I am in there during peak hours about 4 to 5 times a week.  This place is great!! It is clean, weights and machines are well-maintained and the staff are friendly and always willing to help and to answer questions.  This place is not as intimidating as other gyms I have been to. Also they offer free classes and tanning. All in all I would say check it out if you haven't already.  Great place to
work out!!!

resp.text: Thanks Josh! We are so thankful for our wonderful members. Its a pleasure to serve you!

text: Nice facility great staff. But the place is kind of small for the amount of people that go there. Gets difficult to use equipment during peak hours and after hours you run into issues with some of the members acting like the place belongs to them only. But you can’t blame 24e for that. All in all I like the place and the staff just could be bigger.

resp.text: Hi Steven! Thanks for the review! We greatly value you as a member and appreciate this feedback.

text: I have been a member for about 2 years. I love this gym. The staff is super helpful and extremely knowledgeable. They truly offer something for everyone. The members themselves set the gym apart from other gyms. Everybody there is so nice and courteous. I traveled a lot for work and have visited other gyms across the southeast, and this is the best...by far. Do yourself a favor and try this gym.

text: For the first time in my life I am medication/prescription free and have been able to correct many bodily and mental issues through the gentle chiropractic and ERT care received here with Dr. Z and his staff. this office has helped alleviate and correct issues from decades ago in just a few months without drugs. The office does come off at first as chaotic, a little unorganized, and rushed HOWEVER I recommend this place to everyone despite that because it is the only time I have seen and felt relief in my body and mind. I've seen multiple doctors, been on every medication under the sun, and even had surgeries, none of which ever actually corrected my underlying issues and at most only suppressed the pain temporarily.

resp.text: So happy you are better Brittany!

The office is also very accommodating when you need to reschedule, and the wait times are generally very reasonable. Highly recommended!!

name: James DeWick
text: Came in to do stem cells thinking that it would be my only option for relieving chronic pain in my knees. Dr Z gave me an examination and a chiropractic session that relieved most if not all of the pain in my knees instantly. Now we are doing blood work and other tests to determine underlying causes of this issue. I’m very happy I went with Dr Z because he’s a truly honest and caring person. Thank you !

name: Jamie Ward
text: The personnel are very friendly. When I walked in and heard the 70’s light rock over the sound system I knew this was my kind of place. I went in for lower back pain that kept me nearly immobile for a week. I came here after reading the reviews, desperate for relief. I felt great after my initial visit and with my continuing therapy feeling better each day. I’m also learning a lot from the doc about my health and how to maintain it without pharmaceuticals.

resp.text: Glad to hear you are feeling better Jamie, Thank you for the nice review!

name: James Avery
text: Dr. Z is amazing and acupuncture works! I no longer have to suffer through near constant nerve pain. Dr. Z listens carefully to symptoms and issues and treats accordingly. Through incredible ancient practice, he is teaching my body how to heal itself. I recommend Medplus to anyone for any aliment or struggle you face.

resp.text: So happy you are feeling better James.

name: Johanna Lodder
text:
I was in a car accident, ended up with neck fusion herniated disc, lots of pain.  Considering I never used a primary care doctor before this because I didn't need one, went to gynecologist yearly, that was it. Suddenly it was lots of doctors tests etc.  Spent the last two years with orthopedic, chiropractors, muscular therapists but still in pain, still not able to sleep well.   Pain changes you....but I wasn't going to give up yet. My primary care Dr. recommended Lions Mane and Dr Z. Ordered the supplement on Amazon started taking it, it really helped with brain fog from concussion. So I headed off to Dr Z, not expecting too much, I was already seeing a chropracter.  Wow, what a difference, decompression has reduced the nagging pain, the first morning after, I woke up because I was rested!  Hadn't done that since...before accident.  I get up now in the morning and can feel my feet, and walk normally, not like I have flippers.  I had ligaments and muscles whining and complaining, because now my hips were staying where they should and everything had to stretch.  But I did my stretches and my ankles and left leg aren't hurting like they did.
I am actually thinking about exercising again,  this experience has made me hopefull again.  Thank you.

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review and I am so happy that you are doing so much better!

name: Jasmine Mathis
text: It's easy to integrate a holistic view of heath here. The environment here feels like you are amongst friends, not a sterile impersonal place to churn through "patients".  Doc Z and staff are genuine and show they care in every way!

resp.text: We appreciate the positive review Jasmine.

text: Dr Zlotea took the time to understand my condition and developed a plan that works for me.  I would recommend him highly.

name: Donielle McLendon
text:
I injured myself almost 4 years ago. My left foot and sciatic nerve have caused me to be in almost constant pain since. Before the injury, I ran about 30-45 miles per week, but I have not been able to workout with any regularity since, and it was depressing. I have seen 2 orthopedic surgeons, another chiropractor, a podiatrist, an acupuncturist (a different practice), and massage therapists with little relief. It’s not that they were bad, but they weren’t looking in the right place. He really listened to me and I appreciate that.
Dr. Zlotea has been treating me for the past few weeks for a herniated disc and other issues. He recommended using decompression therapy and it has worked wonders! I don’t think I would have been able to workout again if not for him. I’m only 32 and finally don’t feel like I’m 102. I am able to start light exercise again as of today and I couldn’t be happier! My foot doesn’t hurt at all anymore! I feel like I’m getting my life back.

name: Brandon Glover
text: I get treated every chance I get, Dr. Z is great and the staff are friendly and professional! 10/10 would recommend!

resp.text: Thank you for the review Brandon!

name: Angela Lewis
text: Nicest group of people who worked with me in every step. Would recommend to everyone

resp.text: Thank you Angela!

name: Kendall Jackson
text:
As some of you may remember, in November 2011 I was involved in a vehicular hit and run on Ross Clark Circle, in which I was a pedestrian. To give you an idea of the impact, it fragmented my tibia and fibula in half (lower leg bones). I incurred a lot of bodily damage. At one point I could barely walk due to the various pains due to misalignment. The photo attached shows how much of my skin was removed by the ground, although and I was wearing a pea coat at the time of the incident. To keep things short, I'm less afraid of vehicles passing me on my morning runs than I am to try a new chiropractor. I love the down-to-Earth atmosphere at his office. I strongly recommend you at least give it a few visits to see if his structure is right for you. It only took me ONCE.

Thank you Dr. Z

Kendall Jackson

text: Absolutely love this place. Dr. Z is very good at what he does! Everyone in the office is just super kind. At first the ERT may seem silly, but let me tell you!.. I've done energy work before as its practiced often in my field of work, and he really has a wonderful knack for it and has helped me work out years and lifetimes of negative emotion that was holding me back! I highly recommend this place just the same as I would recommend a spa or retreat. I even got my husband to go now! Dont wait on your health and well-being, your absolutely worth it!

text: Good place

resp.text: Thank you for your review!

name: JJ M
text: This Dr. is nutts!

name: Charlie Crowe
text: I was a little disappointed with my visit. Before I had done the in take paper work as a new patient we were talking about  12 visit plan. I didn’t feel that I was heard. There seemed to be an agenda other than my condition. I will say that they had me in and out fast.

resp.text:
Thank you for your review. Your input is appreciated.
Your perspective on the first visit is different than most of our patients but significant. The intake paperwork asks the patient to list all their symptoms and quantify their health complaints and instructs the patients to quantify their level of improvement over the next 12 treatments.... That is correct. The reason the paperwork addresses a treatment plan is so patients are aware from the beginning that holistic treatment is not a one treatment panacea, it's not a pill and it's not magic. It is a healing process and the specifics are handled individually with each patient.
A 20 minutes face to face with a physician is unheard of these days and if you feel that was a short visit so be it. In a 20-minute visit we addressed the entire human frame above and beyond the chief complaint plus acupuncture and tongue analysis. The process didn't stop when you left the office but it continued as the tongue analysis was performed by OUM physicians in California and THERE WERE THREE EMAIL CONVERSATIONS REGARDING THE SPECIFICS. That was a step I take out of true concern for the health and well-being of my patients but it's cases like these that make excellent physicians become callus.
Best of luck on your journey and next time find something to praise about the next person that gives a damn about your health and well-being

name: Shannon Magers McNamee
text:
I attended the Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp For Women several years ago and loved every minute of it. I stopped attending because of a move to Birmingham. (I’m hoping one day Joe and his family will relocate! :0) ) I never found a great boot camp in Birmingham and ended up joining a gym, but never felt the support and accountability I did while attending HABC. After the pandemic hit, I didn’t feel comfortable going back to the gym and still don’t. Luckily I saw one of Joe’s posts about his online workouts and I signed up right away. I love these online workouts! They are 30 minutes, 4 times a week and so thorough. I feel like I get a great overall workout. Joe takes the time to explain each exercise to make sure you are doing it correctly and gives options for all fitness levels. He also checks in with you to offer support and answer any questions you may have.
If you are looking for a fresh, healthy start - contact Joe today. He’s got a program that will be able to help.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the awesome review Shannon! I'm very grateful to have the opportunity to work with you again.

name: Claire Aiello
text:
I love Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp for Women. I've been going for several years, and it's given me a whole new outlook on life, health, and exercise. Joe Martin is positive, upbeat, and has a daily joke for us (we sometimes laugh) - but the important part is, he keeps us motivated and we motivate each other.

If you don't have your health, you don't have anything. Really! You have to take time for yourself and keep fit.  Or you can't take care of anyone else. Take this time out for yourself -- you are worth it!

Also, if you're hesitant to join because you might think the class is like a "military-style" boot camp, it's not. It is doable and fun.  Every day is different. You'll make some of the best friends, too.  We all support each other -- come join us!

resp.text: Thank you so much Claire! I am now going to hire you to do my marketing :) Because you nailed it! Lift each other up, offer encouragement, and move forward together.

name: Hillary Dunham
text: Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp is absolutely a breath of fresh air for workout plans. If you want to be surrounding with people who are real, funny, encouraging and kind, this is the best place for you! Joe will always  bring relentless positivity and constantly offer different ways to keep your body moving. No crazy diets, no fads, just simple and effective ways to keep moving without feeling bad about whatever place you are currently in. You will not regret any time spend at Boot Camp with friends and with Joe. It's a great investment in yourself and I'm so glad I made it!

resp.text: Thank you so much Hillary! When gingers combine forces amazing things happen :)

name: Kari Fox
text: Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp is the best! It’s is well suited for any age woman of any fitness level. Joe offers many convenient times, he is great at keeping me motivated and he is loads of fun! I’ve been participating for a year and can definitely tell a difference in my muscle tone and energy level. I highly recommend it!

resp.text: Thank you so much Kari, I appreciate you!

name: Elizabeth Riggle
text: I came across information on Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp & Joe Martin at a time when I was frustrated and stressed with changes that Covid had created in my life.  I was eating my way through it & not exercising.  I decided to give the program a try.  Great decision!  Joe offers virtual workouts which is great.  He does them live, but also sends you a link, so you can do them at a time that is convenient for you.  You have no excuse not to do the workout.  He designs workouts for all fitness levels.  He demonstrates options for the exercises for beginners to those wanting a challenge.  In the past I would get bored exercising & end up quitting, especially at holiday time until this year.  I started in June & have stuck with it.  Joe is a wonderful coach who truly cares & wants to help you become a healthier & happier you.  He sends several emails a week filled with encouragement & motivation.  If you are struggling let him know & he will work with you.  He is always willing to answer questions about nutrition & exercise.

resp.text: What an awesome review Elizabeth, I am blown away! Thank you so much

name: Magen Sanders
text: In the past have been guilty of never sticking with a program or workout. However, with Joe's boot camp I have stayed inspired! Everyday is a different workout that keeps my body from getting too fatigued and my mind alert. The ladies at the classes should also be noted as welcoming and great proof that this is an uplifting community of people who care about health and well being. Thanks Joe!

resp.text: Thank you so much Magen! And you nailed it. The ladies in the class are what separates us from other gyms. Stronger together, all are welcome!

name: Annie Phillips
text: I have been attending HABC for about a year and a half, and it is one of the best things I have ever done, both for my physical and my mental health. Joe Martin leads us through our exercise with warmth and fun and fellowship. If you can't do a certain exercise the traditional way, he offers alternatives for your needs. I have met so many wonderful women who I call friends, and Joe is a dear friend now too. Do something life-giving for yourself in 2021 and join us!

resp.text: The gift that keeps on giving! Like the Jelly of the Month Club :) Thank you so much for the kinds words Annie, it is definitely more than just an exercise class.

name: Amy Slamp
text: If you are woman looking for a great place to work out with other women and a fun and inspiring leader, this is the place for you.  Joe Martin makes  doing a workout at 5:30 am something you want to get up for.  I have developed some great friends I would not have gotten to know otherwise, and every day Joe shares a funny "Dad" joke so what better way to start your day.

resp.text: So grateful you are a part of the HABC Family Amy!

name: Patti Blacklock
text: Joe Martin's Huntsville Adventure Book Camp for Women is a great option for women of all fitness levels to get in shape physically and nutritionally. The boot camps are fun and challenging, and Joe, along with my fellow boot camps, offer encouragement and motivation that keeps me working toward my fitness and nutrition goals so that I am as healthy as I can be.

resp.text: Thank you, Patti it has been awesome having the opportunity to work with you for so long. Here's to many more years together!

name: Donna Van Berkom
text: Joe is an excellent trainer.  He gives various options depending on your workout level.  Exercises are geared towards total body workouts, balance and cardio.   Joe helps you set your goals and meet them.

resp.text: Thank you so much for being a part of the Adventure Boot Camp family DVB! I'm so glad I get to work with you again even if we can't meet face to face.

name: Joy Wiseman
text: Changing lives one burpee at a time! Seriously the most fun workouts I have ever done! Joe is motivating and the other ladies very supportive. You will not regret joining, even with squats and burpees... 5 more seconds and funny dad jokes!

resp.text: Thank you so much Joy! Burpees have been banned by the CDC, so we should be ok going forward :)

name: Chelsea Bell
text: I’ve lost 50lbs in 7 months following Joe’s program! Huntsville Adventure Bootcamp provides me an effective program, tips/tricks for changing my bad habits and I actually look forward to working out every day.

resp.text: So proud you Chelsea! You have done amazing and you continue to get better. Keep up the great work!

name: amy burnette
text: I have been going to Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp, for over a year now and by far the best place to workout for women. The atmosphere is so welcoming, supportive, encouraging, motivating, and positive. The workouts are always different, so you never get bored and have something to look forward to each time. Your fitness level doesn't matter, Joe incorporates a way for all to benefit whether your just beginning your journey or needing a challenge. I drive over thirty minutes one way to attend and love every minute of Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp. HABC is not like other gyms, in that it gives you a sense of family. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you so much Amy! I'm so proud of how far you've come since you started. You are a rock star!

name: Kristine Maness
text: It’s more than a great workout. It’s a great support system. I’ve met some of my closest friends here. Joe is the BEST cheerleader/trainer. He encourages and supports us in everything, both inside and outside of class. Can’t imagine not having HABC as part of my life.

resp.text: You just pretty much wrote out my mission statement for me! Thank you so much, I can't imagine HABC without you.

name: Wendy Smythe
text: HABC is a great place to workout and make life long friends.  Joe always has a positive and encouraging attitude and philosophy and gladly welcomes all who strive to get healthy and feel better.  Exercises and programs can be adapted to meet individual needs that provide results for everyone who participates.  I highly recommend it.

resp.text: Thank you so much Wendy, I really appreciate the kind words! All are welcome at the house of awesome :)

name: Gay Schill
text: Joe got me moving again!   Great workouts understands limitations and works with you.  I could barely get up off the floor now i am getting stronger day by day and was able to get up today after only a week without so much pain.  So thankful I have found him!

resp.text: I'm so thankful you started too! Stronger every day :)

name: Claudinette Purifoy-Fears
text: One of the best decisions I ever made. The workouts can be modified to accommodate fitness level. Love working out in the company of positive and uplifting women. Going on year 9!

resp.text: Thank you Claudinette! I really appreciate your loyalty and commitment after all these years. You are awesome!

name: Laura Lynn Hardy
text: Very welcoming atmosphere! Structured workouts that can be varied to your ability and strength level. Joe is a great coach and motivator. I've kicked things up for myself in a way that I would not do on my own at a gym.

resp.text: Thank you so much Laura Lynn! Keep up the great work.

name: Jess R
text: Just beginning but so far HABC has been great. Great workouts that aren’t daunting, no high pressure to be perfect or already in great shape, customizes each exercise to benefit ladies at all fitness levels, friendly environment. I can feel it working already. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you so much Jess, so glad you started coming!

name: Leigh Holeman
text: Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp for Women is awesome! Joe is a good leader who really cares about you. The workouts are excellent, and are always new and different - you won't get bored here! Highly recommended.

resp.text: Thank you so much No E! So glad you are part of the HABC family.

name: Tory Green
text: Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp for Women has been a real game changer for me.  Joe is a patient and kind trainer who actually makes exercise fun.  I have made life-long friends in this class as well.  Sign up!  You won't regret it.

resp.text: Thank you so much Tory! Life-long friends and buffness. What more could you ask for? :)

name: Cairenn Martin
text: Women of all ages can benefit from Adventure Boot Camp.  Joe makes exercising fun! He is also very knowledgeable about physical fitness so his sessions are well balanced for strength and cardio. I highly recommend Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp!

resp.text: Thank you so much! I hear the owner's mom is the BEST.

name: Ashley Gray
text: HABC is the only exercise program I have stuck with and actually look forward to going to! Joe is the best coach! He offers a variety workouts for all fitness levels, and believe it or not makes the workout FUN! If you enjoy hanging out with a group of women (and one man) who are getting up before the sun or showing up after a long day because they are motivated to just be better, HABC is where you belong!

resp.text: You guys make it fun for me! I take it as a huge honor that people take an hour out of their day to spend at HABC. And I hear people there wear the coolest shirts.

name: Deborah Holt
text: I absolutely love this exercise program. Joe Martin is an incredible person who truly enjoys helping others with exercise and making the healthier food choices; and his daily jokes are hysterical.

resp.text: I am blessed to be able to do what I do for a living. I love it! And thank you for recognizing the hilarity of the jokes, I work really hard on them :)

name: Laurali Hollister
text: I am a big fan of Joe's bootcamp.  His knowledge keeps you exercising no matter what kind of issue you might have.  You control how strenuous you want to work out and there's lots of laughter, fun and encouragement from your fellow bootcampers.  When I can be consistent I'm in great physical shape.

resp.text: So glad to have you back Laurali! You're a big part of making that laughter happen. And not just because you talk to yourself :)

name: Ashley DeHaye
text: Joe works hard to keep fitness accessible and make workouts not boring. He also genuinely cares about the people he works with and will always go the extra mile to make sure they are successful.

resp.text: Thank you Ashley! I really appreciate you being part of the HABC family.

name: Wendy Hnetynka
text: Coach Joe Martin is truly committed to the overall fitness and well-being of his boot campers. The atmosphere is always fun, friendly and encouraging. The workout routines are never repetitive. They are designed to encourage consistent participation by keeping you entertained and motivated. Great music, friendships and even a joke of the day!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review Wendy, you are awesome!

name: Elena Aiello
text: Fantastic program! I've been doing this for a year and it's changed my life for the better. It's changed my view on exercise/fitness - which should be fun, not something you dread. Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp is fun - I look forward to going every day. Joe Martin makes it different and challenging. No day is ever the same. He's the best -- and the ladies are wonderful. We all support each other and you do things at your level. If you feel like challenging yourself, go for it. Joe will give you different levels to try for each exercise. He's awesome and very supportive. You will be supported by everyone there.

resp.text: Thank you so much! You nailed a lot of the things I hold near and dear to my heart about boot camp. We are family!

name: Susan Presley
text: Joe is a great motivator and even starts each class off with a joke. He keeps the classes fun.

resp.text: Thank you so much Susan! And the joke is ALWAYS hilarious.

name: Mary Ottman - Leadership Speaker & Certified Coach
text: Joe is a fantastic trainer.  I couldn't do one ONE push-up when I started, and he never made me feel like I was "behind" the rest of the class.  He is always super supportive and has a wealth of knowledge and ways to modify exercises to your skill level.  Newbies train next to serious exercisers, and everybody feels like they are part of his tribe.  His wife and his mom both come to some of the classes too, and that makes it a cool family vibe.  He plays great music and he is always super positive.  In addition, he lets us know about local exercise events and we have the opportunity to be part of his team, helping the community, i.e. the Liz Hurley 5K.  Everyone is welcome to join in.  Another huge plus is that the ladies in the classes are SO friendly and supportive!! It truly is a tribe of supportive women (and Joe!) who want to be the best versions of themselves! I couldn't recommend this boot camp any higher! It is awesome!!! 💗💕💖💗💕💖

resp.text: Thank you so much Mary! It was your hard work that made it happen. Proud to call you my friend!

name: Donna Baughn
text: I didn’t know what to expect when I signed up for a month of boot camp. After not exercising for years I was not in any shape to flip tires or push a sled. But that wasn’t what it was like at all. Joe gives me modified versions of the exercise when I need it based on my fitness level. I never feel like I can’t do something but I am amazed daily at how much more I can do since starting boot camp. Best part is that exercise is now part of my daily life and I look forward to boot camp each and every day because each day is different.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review Donna! I can't imagine having class without you now, you rock star you.

name: Marie Ferguson
text: Don't let the words "Boot Camp" scare you.  It's fun, challenging, inspiring and just an all around good time.  You will meet an amazing group of women who will do anything to keep you and each other motivated.  They make me laugh every day.  Joe scales the work outs for every level of fitness.  When I first started I couldn't imagine how everyone was doing the exercises and carrying on a conversation, now I'm cutting up as much as anyone.  Probably the most fun you can legally have at 5:30 in the morning.  Give a try, you might just love it!!

resp.text: You are a big part of why it is fun and inspirational Marie, so glad you are a part of the boot camp family!

name: Erina at Work
text: You will not find a nicer, more dedicated fitness coach than Joe Martin and these boot camp sessions are not only very effective but they are a lot of fun. Joe is truly committed to helping women meet their health and fitness goals but he understands it's important to do it with humor and humility.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review Erina! It is always fun to work with you.

name: Heather Thacker
text: If you want to get stronger, leaner, feel better AND laugh your head off, this boot camp is for you.  Joe Martin is the leader of this crew and is the best in his field.  All ages and sizes were in my classes and everyone loved it!

resp.text: Thank you Heather, that is very kind of you!

name: Jessica Burton
text: Joe is amazing! He genuinely cares about everyone! His workouts are always different and creative. His jokes are great too!! I definitely would recommend Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp.

resp.text: Thank you so much Jessica, so glad you are a part of the HABC family!

name: Crystal Hanson
text: I began hoping to complete a month. 18 months later I'm still at it! I've been encouraged, cheered for, welcomed at whatever fitness level I am at. If I'm absent, I'm missed. I've never had more fun getting healthy! I love this program! And Joe is one of a kind!

resp.text: Thank you so much Crystal! It has been awesome seeing you continue to improve, actually enjoy exercise, and learn more about music from you :) Keep up the great work!

name: Kimberly Widner
text: Best health decision I have ever made! Joe has created an environment that is welcoming, supportive and challenging. I have never enjoyed exercising but Joe makes it fun!

resp.text: I'm so thankful for your review Kim! That is my goal in life, to get people enjoying exercise. Thank you for being a part of the HABC family!

name: Becky Phillips
text: Best decision Ive made regarding my health! Its a go at your own pace class in a group setting.  Everyone is so encouraging and fun to be around.  Joe Martin is a great instructor, always switching things up and keeps it fresh and always good for a laugh.  Thank you Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp!

resp.text: Thank you so much Becky! You have done and continue to do amazing. Grateful to have you as a client!

name: Joanne Long
text: Fun, fabulous and uplifting. Getting healthy and making friends at the same time, completely non threatening since it's all women of different ages shapes and sizes, except Joe of course, but he came to the dark side a long time ago and can easily manage to not lose his cool when talking about sweaty female parts!

resp.text: Thanks for the great review Joanne! I think...

name: Patty Sykstus
text: Joe is the best!  Very motivating and supportive!

resp.text: Thank you so much Patty, you are awesome!

name: Functional Chiropractic
text: If you are looking for a great fitness option, then Joe Martin and his team at Adventure Bootcamp is the right place to go.  I have been involved in several of his workouts and know that they are not only effective and fun, but also easy to jump into at every level.  Highly recommend you check out his website or call Joe Martin to get signed up.

resp.text: Thank you Dr. Porter, really appreciate the kind words!

name: Leigh Anne McMahon
text: HABC offers up an inclusive and safe environment for women on all fitness levels and ages to get up, get moving, get stronger, get results.  Joe's program has made all the difference for me, helping me get leaner and making me a much stronger runner.  He is relentlessly positive and does an excellent job of keeping things fresh and interesting.  You won't meet a better group of women to exercise with and get support from either.  Five stars, without a doubt!

resp.text: Thank you so much LA! You're the bee's knees :)

name: Marie Held
text: Wonderful way to get your daily exercise in.

resp.text: Thank you Marie, so glad you are a part of that daily exercise!

name: Erina Galloway
text: If you don't like going to the gym (me) and really enjoy being outside (me) this is the boot camp for you. It's fun without losing the challenge of getting in shape. You are driven and pushed but through laughter and motivation, not just from the fearless leader (Joe) but the many amazing people you will encounter.  Do yourself a favor and try it out, you won't regret it!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review Erina, you are awesome!

name: Brianne Oleson
text: Fun and great place to get your workout on!!

resp.text: Thank you so much Brianne, so glad you are a part of the boot camp fam!

name: Nancy Smith
text: Want to change your way of working out? Come to HABC with Joe Martin! It is a fun and effective workout - just show up, do what Joe says (if you can hear him over the gossip and giggling - LOL) and give it all you got. Wonderful group of ladies and Joe's got jokes!

resp.text: The jokes are so hilarious! I can't stress enough how hilarious they are. Thank you so much Nancy, you are a rock star.

name: Monica Sanford
text: Joe is amazing!  His classes are fun but you still get a great workout.  If you're sitting in the fence and wonder if you should try HABC...wonder no more.  Just do it!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 start review Monica! And that is great advice for getting started with HABC.

name: Vickie Blacklock
text: Get to exercise with old friends and new. Diverse and challenging workouts that are different everyday. Great for mind, body and soul! Thanks Joe!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review Vickie!

name: Aquita Wherry
text: Great motivator! Work outs are fun whether indoors or out.  Great knowledge and great fun

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Aquita!

name: Kellie Andrews
text: Joe Martin creates a challenging workout experience with fun and encouragement and new friends. If anything is holding you back from getting healthy, you should give Boot Camp a try. It's a party with friends where you get fit!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Kellie! I really like your description of our classes  too :)

name: Jade Gann
text: Joe is awesome!!!

resp.text: Thank you Jade! Takes awesome to know awesome.

name: Sherri Stroud
text: Joining an exercise program can be daunting, joining a "Boot Camp" is terrifying...until you find Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp!  Joe Martin is more than a boot camp instructor, he is a personal trainer, nutritionist and a friend to all his clients. He offers a program that suits all fitness levels and all age ranges and somehow manages to be crazy fun!

resp.text: Thank you so much Sherri! Exercise doesn't have to be misersable to be effective. Looking forward to more awesome with you in the future!

name: Eula Pugh
text: Huntsville Adventure Boot Camp is a great place to get into shape, loose weight and be around encouraging women while you are on your healthy lifestyle journey.

resp.text: So proud of how far you have come Eula, you are doing awesome!

name: Vicky Mathis
text: Fun and exciting workout that doesn't feel like work at all - until you feel the burn later!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind review Vicky!

name: Rena Strange
text: Awesome Boot Camp!  Great atmosphere, professional support, fun way to get in shape.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review Rena!

name: Marcie Lewis
text: I have been doing boot camp for 10 years and I cannot say enough about how much I love it!

resp.text: Boot Camp OG! So glad you are still coming after all these years :)

name: Amanda Pope
text: Such a great way to workout - it is FUN, not work!

resp.text: Thank you so much Amanda! Exercise doesn't have to be miserable, so glad you enjoyed the workouts.

name: Junior Pruitt
text: Since Jesse has taken charge,  things have greatly improved and I'm looking forward to seeing great things at this location.

name: Corey Johnson
text: Joined this gym a few months ago and it's very convenient,  clean, and it's not a hassle to get in touch with management if I need to. Would def recommend to anyone who is looking for a more so small gym that's not too noisy and with friendly members!!

name: Sherri Wallace
text: The new manager Rodney has FIXED all of my billing issues! After trying to cancel my membership for a whole two months, the new manager has totally fixed everything, reassured me that it will never happen again & gave me a complimentary 2 free months

name: McKenzie Bates
text: One of the best gyms that's close to my house

name: Michelle Constance
text: I had a membership at Calera Snap Fitness for probably about a year. Management is very poor at communicating, taking care of equipment, and canceling your membership when requested. I canceled my membership in May of 2020 and still got billed for June, July, and August. I had to put a stop payment on my account and they changed their merchant name so they could start billing me again. I am not the only one this was done to. Since my email in May I was also contacted two other times about my membership and needing payment. I reiterated that my account should already be canceled and they proceeded to tell me it is now canceled but do not mention a word about my refund.

name: Kristina Stephens
text: This gym is horrible. If I could give it negative stars I would. Initially I had to drop by several times for someone to be there for me to join. I should have known then that this was a terrible establishment.  I've been trying to cancel my membership since March and yet I can't get in contact with anyone to do that. I've called and left voicemails and even emailed with no response. I'm simply fed up. On top of that half the machines didn't work and the cable was off half the time. Don't waste your time or money here.

name: Fabio Alnaham
text: The WORST membership you will EVER subscribe to . This is highway robbery and for many reason . The employees were rude on the first day I went to get my membership. Also I've been stuck with a membership that I've been trying to cancel for more than a year now. I have attempted EVERYTHING to try and get in contact with them to cancel it. I have left countless voicemails with all my contact information and I have not been contacted at all. I have went in person and no one was even there. The point is they take your money and avoid you at ALL costs from trying to get it cancelled. Its not just me that had this issue but two other friends as well. I highly do not recommend this gym at all . Any other gym is wayyyyy better then this. Save your money and save yourself some headaches and look somewhere else.

name: Joey Thomason
text: Purchased membership online. Have not been able to get into the gym once. Door is locked. Apparently the water has been cut off, the staff has all quit, the  phone doesn’t work, and the owner has been AWOL for months. I’ve paid for a membership and am literally unable to use it or cancel it. Going to charge back the original payment and block any future payments.

name: Anna Hopson
text: For a “24-7” gym... THEYRE NEVER OPEN!!!

name: joe cox
text: The new manager Pamela has turned this place around. We stopped going to this location while ago because it was filthy and dark. Now she has cleaned everything spotless and much brighter. She also enforces that everyone entering must be a member. Really like the new atmosphere. From 1 star to 5 star. Recommend

name: NaturalBornSpartans
text: Mis-managed hot garbage

name: janny leson
text: They will not fix broken equipment. Manager has a BAD attitude problem (a lot of people talk about this all the time). She has smart attitude with employees and its sad to act that way in front of customers. We all see it regularly. How do you even have a job lady?

name: karen tortorigi
text:
Can not recommend this location as long as the manager (Karen) is still there.
I called and spoke with her to cancel membership in May said she would.
DID NOT HAPPEN. My bank acct was charged 30.00. Called back left VM and email. NO RESPONSE. I have had issues before I cancelled of her not responding to my emails or VM said she was having trouble with emails what about VM pretty sad if cant get to the MANAGER.
I have another 30.00 charged for July so I'm trying to get my money back .
Called CORPORATE

name: Alison Boothe
text: I have only been a member since February 2018 and out of all the gyms I've been apart of I've never been treated so special as I am at this Snap Fitness.  Miss Pamela, Snap Fitness Calera, AL gym manager always says hello and makes me feel special! I have met so many nice people!  A huge thank you and appreciation to Rick Anderson, Snap Fitness Calera, AL Personal Trainer for without his guidance, positive enthusiasm, and extensive knowledge and experience i couldn't have lost the so far 40 lbs since I joined the gym in February.  The members and staff make this gym by far the best gym I've ever had the pleasure to be a part of!

name: Lindsey Davis
text:
The facility it's self is nice enough not exactly clean but its a gym....  the staff is awful, other members of the gym showed me equipment, how to use the key pass, and tanning bed.
the hours they have posted of the website mean nothing I had to call 3 times between 9 - 11 before I could get someone to answer. The women there, pamela could not answer any of my questions without asking "the guys" I assume she meant management or perhaps an owner and when I requested to cancel my membership she insisted that I come to the location. When I made her aware that it wasn't possible for me to get there or even leave my home she was persistent in finding out why as if it was any of her business and still refused to cancel my membership after calling 5 times in a month I eventually had to cancel my credit card to keep them from charging me.

name: Chanda Mitchell
text: I live it except for the darn music they play. Great selection of workout equipment, kept clean, nice employees,   and quiey. Just horrible music

name: James Jackson
text: Friendliest staff and cleanest gym you will ever visit with lots of cardio and strength training options!

name: Danny Barbee
text: I have called several times to inguire about joining. Voicemail says someone will return call within 24 hours. Never happened! Went there yesterday and only one person was there and he wouldn’t even come to the door. I guess they don’t need any more members. My guess is this place will not be in business much longer.

name: Gary Johnston
text: Nice and quiet place to work out.

name: Tommy Harris
text: Never really crowded. The work out equipment may have problems from time to time, but they do their best to fix them.

name: Melissa Martin
text: The place has went down since we join alot of stuff needs to be fixed. Ask for another key and been waiting  a month and also the workout  room has not work for a year

name: C S
text: I have been trying to cancel my membership for the past month and a half. I do not live in the area anymore and was not able to come to the location. After countless phone calls and leaving voicemail after voicemail (which prompts I will be called back within 24 hours) I finally called during the magic time to reach an employee to cancel. If you want to cancel your membership and you cannot visit the location be prepared to be charged 2 months worth of membership fees before you actually reach someone.

name: Nathan French
text: Can not get my membership cancel I have tried three times to Cancel my membership every time I go to cancel the tell me my membership is at another branch. Poor customer service all they want to do is overcharge people.  I would never recommend gym.

name: Mohamed Elnaham
text: I haven't been in calera for more than 2 months, I try to call them to cancel my member ship, or do something about it, because I'm been charged while I'm not even there, this the second month I'm been charged by this gym, every time I call they won't answer, I went there the other day to talk to someone, and there was no body at all around 11am, now I'm calling around 3pm and still no body to talk too! I need help

name: Luke Moore
text: I’ve tried multiple times to cancel my membership, each month continuously charged.

name: Nia Marie
text:
Horrible customer service they are only open about 3 hours during the day and do not answer the phone when it is business hours
I have tried to cancel my membership in October the woman I spoke to told me it was cancelled and I didn’t have to sign anything just gave her my information 3 months later and I’m still being charged and no one answers the phone I’ve contacted customer service and they haven’t answered me either

name: Dan Compton
text: One day at a time

name: Karol Patras Layton
text: Great place to workout

name: Krista Kiser
text: I'm very happy with the service I received at Premiere Dental Spa. Dr. Teneshia was very informative and professional. I will be returning.

name: Rosemary Davidson
text:
Relaxing environment for a massage. Paul is my favorite massage therapist. Relaxing music, soft lighting, heated table. I return each month (or more). First, Paul does an assessment, observing the way I'm standing, or favoring one sore knee or hip before he begins. And he asks how I'm doing so he can specialize the massage.

Some times he uses hot stones, other times cold therapy, to encourage the tight muscles to relax. His deep tissue massage has increased my flexibility and released trigger points. He educates as he relieves aches and pains, so I can continue the good stretches and healing at home.
The spa offers wonderful services and reasonable prices. There are even packages available with monthly massages, treatments and facials.

name: Valerie Murphy
text:
I called the spa a few times for information and appointment. The young woman answering the phone seemed bothered by my call and quick to end the call. She hung up before completing her sentence.
We are new to Huntsville and the Tennessee Valley. We transferred from Florida to Restone Arsenal. I was expecting some southern hospitality BUT felt quit the opposite. I spend thousands on looking my best. I will NOT hand over my money to rude unappreciated businesses.

I strongly suggest Blue train their employees on PROPER phone etiquette.

name: Kristie Williams
text:
I'm not sure where to start, so I'll start with the positive. The facial was phenomenal. That's the end of the good. The Massage was TERRIBLE and I mean TERRIBLE! WORST I'VE EVER EVER EVER HAD! I teach massage therapy and I'm telling you, this guy would NOT pass my class. Worst experience ever. My best friends little boy can massage better and he's 4!!! Pitiful!
The robes had holes in them, the staff was very loud and didn't seem to care that we were paying a TON of money to be in sessions. People walking up and down the hall clunking LOUD shoes and basically yelling. AWFUL! This was my 1st time to a spa setting because I teach chronic pain therapy. If this is what it's like, I won't go back to another spa. The ONLY reason I gave a 2 was because the facial was very good.
Awful waste of money for everything else

name: VIELKA
text:
Hi I'm Vielka License Massage Therapist  since 2012 and I start working at Blue Med Spa this week 06/16/2017.  and I will like to build clientele there.
I will like to invite you all to give me one try as massage therapist there. and any positive or negative review about my massage are more then welcome, that is what make things better. and about the noise, I will mention this to the new manager. thank you! and hope to see some  you soon on my table.  :)

name: Sonya Bean
text: I had a horrible experience at this spa. I called in advance to get the balance on my gift card and was told it was $70 so I made a massage appointment. When I went to check out the very rude receptionist told me the card was not valid for a massage treatment. I used the same card in the past for a massage for me and my husband. I don’t know why today was any different . I offered to pay the $55 that I owed minus the gift card amount and she wouldn’t take my payment. She would not let me speak to the general manager and told me to call him or her Monday so I left and she stole $70 from my credit card. I will not be back to this spa and will pursue getting my money back. I did not authorize a charge to my credit card. I offered payment of the remaining balance after the gift card and she refused it. Thisp incident was ridiculous and very unprofessional  for such a supposedly high end establishment.

name: Mike Leotta
text: We came here four years ago and it was nice, they had a spa area downstairs with a locker room, sauna, jet tub, showers, and refreshments. My wife and I decided to come here again for a couples massage, like we had the first time and they had moved upstairs. So no more sauna area or any of that. Also, we wanted couples massages but were put in separate rooms, which isn't a big deal really but don't sell them as couples massages on your website and then your guests get a surprise when they're already there saying that oh no we moved upstairs sorry. I could hear someone running the sink in the next room when I was getting a massage. Four years ago it was great. Today, not so much. Their prices are the same and it isn't the spa experience we wanted. It feels like they cheaped out. I'd look elsewhere.

name: Wayne Martin
text: The last two times that I have gone for massages, the masseuse (different each time) talked to me. I left knowing too much personal information about them and their problems. It was very unprofessional. Also, the last massage was 90 minutes. I described tension in my neck as the main reason for being there. I was surprised when the 90 minutes came to an end and my neck had not even been touched. I will be finding an alternative spa in Huntsville.

name: Brittany Dale
text:
My experience at this spa was less than satisfactory. I figured since it was a more upscale spa that I would only have positive things to say, but I was very wrong. I went to get one syringe of Restylane. The doctor examined the structure of my face then proceeded to prepare injecting. First, he did not clean off the area he was injecting. Second, he did not wash his hands or put gloves on before touching all over my face or doing the injection. To no surprise because I have sensitive skin, the very next day I broke out in the same exact spot he touched. While injecting, he was sitting on a stool while I was propped up in the patient’s chair. I’m no doctor but I’m pretty certain that as the injector, he should’ve been standing to get a clear view of exactly where and how much product he was injecting. Lastly, he did not massage or smooth out the product during or immediately after injecting!! Which resulted in a lump. It wasn’t very noticeable from just looking at me from the front. However, I could definitely feel it and from the side view of my face you could tell something wasn’t quite right.

I gave it a couple of days for the slight swelling I had to go down and to give time for the Restylane to settle in. Also, he put more than half the syringe on one side of my face and what felt like air in the other side because there was no difference at all.  ALSO, the lump I felt was more so in the lowest portion of my check rather than the actual smile line where it should’ve been. I’m assuming this was due to him sitting during the injection and not having a clear view of what he was doing. 10 days later, lump is still there. I went back to the office and all he could do was offer to inject another syringe for $100 off. I declined the offer because I refused to spend any more money at that spa. Do not go here to get fillers.

Dr. Marlow at Infinty Med-i-Spa fixed all the issues I had.

name: Jonathan pike
text: I had some laser hair removal done at blue med spa, and  i had a great experience and well trained and pleasant staff that made my time there great. The Massage i had there was awesome to,  Thanks Great Job!

name: Joshua Walters
text: I was initially nervous about surgery, but Dr. Bundrick put me at ease!!  Thanks Doc!  Great staff.  Great all around.

name: Tracy Williams
text: Dr. Bundrick is wonderful!!! He was so patient and answered all of my questions very professionally. GREAT experience!!!

name: Addy Noms
text:
This used to be one of the most well appointed spas in Huntsville.  The female lounge had a hot tub, wet sauna and dry sauna as well as showers.

For the past several months, the hot tub has been broken.  The wet sauna is neglected, dingy and smells like mold when you walk in.  The dry sauna is working correctly.

There's a general aura of neglect that makes the expensive price tag undefendable.  I still have pretty good massages here but I get the sense the place isn't as profitable as it needs to be and maintenance and upkeep is suffering.

For a $100 massage and automatic 18% gratuity, I expect the facilities to be in working and clean order.  For now, I'm going to Terrame where the massages are less expensive and the environment is the same - they have a dry sauna too.

name: John Zuber
text: So So,  The facility really needs cleaning and new robes and sandals.  The personel were fine and did thier jobs, but management is just not keeping the facility up.  While waiting in the waiting room I noticed the heating / cooling vents were extremely dirty to the point of almost stuff hanging down from them.  The robes were dingy and sort of smelly not s nice smell at all.  It convinced me not to get another massage or pedicure at this place again.  Not sure what the health rating was ?  Never saw the inspection/rating sheet.

text: Disappointed in the filler results.  A follow up left it even worse.  All that money spent, and the trust placed in the doctor.  All of it wasted as I am going to another doctor to rectify the unfortunate results.

text: I set up appointment a week ago and secretary said they couldn't see me until the following Tuesday because they didn't have business license. Get there Tuesday at 4:45 an secretary tells me that you were one of the ones I couldn't contact and let know doctor wasn't there. I told her that she didn't try to call, text, or email me at all! VERY UNPROFESSIONAL! Wasting my time

resp.text: We completely agree with you that all of this was very unprofessional.  We are so sorry for the inconvenience!  We are having staffing issues and hope to have them resolved asap.  Please don't give up on us.  We would love for you to hang in there with us and give us the opportunity to partner with you in your weight loss efforts.  We totally understand if you don't and again we are very sorry for your trouble.

name: Angela Pressley
text: I canceled our membership in July due to Covid. I called and the owner assured me we would not be charged in August and that the account was closed. Well guess what the money come out and when I called him back he said they would refund my money back not to worry. I then asked him if it would be going the same thing in September he once again assured me it wouldn’t. Oh but yes it did oh and I still haven’t gotten my refund from August. So now I paid for two months after my account had been closed. Well then to top it off no one will return a phone call,text or email about my money. Then today I get another email saying they are trying to take another payment out of my account! I was stolen from,lied to and just completely ignored. Today I called and asked for corporate’s phone number well guess what they didn’t answer either. I maybe out of all that money but if I can stop someone else from getting treated the way I was, it will be worth it.

name: hayden bryars
text: The place is always dirty, short on weight plates and constantly has malfunctioning restrooms.. I cancelled my membership and was charged a month later. When I called about it, the employee told me there was no membership change from on file (not accurate) then he called me an a**shole. This place is a JOKE!

name: Tam Nguyen
text: They closed and move when I came back in my routine bad service ever

name: Reginald Ingram
text: It's great for a small town gym. The membership pricing is affordable. They offer a great mix of free weights as well as machines, they have a cardio room that's great for stretching, and now has a punching bag in it (major plus since no other gyms in the area has a punching bag). They do have some good personal trainers, and offer classes. One major benefit is its 24/7. You can work out on your own schedule to fit your lifestyle.  I prefer working out at 4am, and this gym affords me that luxury. I've never had a wait time to use any machine, that's also a major plus. The staff keeps all areas of this gym very clean, and most patrons usually wipe down things after they've used them.

name: Kanina Crosen
text: Suddenly stopped honoring free passes that we have handed out for years! Didn’t bother to actually call us and let us know. I guess they don’t like getting more business.

A treadmill has a broken incline button where it's falling off. A aerobic machine sticks and nearly threw me off whilst trying to use it. Don't use this gym. Go to a different SnapFitness. The one in pellcity is clean, kind and has amazing staff/patrons.
